name: Perfect Scrambled Eggs
description: Creamy, fluffy scrambled eggs in under 5 minutes
instructions: Crack eggs into a bowl and add milk. Whisk until well combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium-low heat and add butter.
Once butter melts and foams, pour in egg mixture.
Let sit for 20 seconds, then gently stir with a spatula.
Continue stirring every 30 seconds until eggs are just set but still creamy.
Remove from heat, season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

name: Quick Fried Rice
description: Use leftover rice for this fast and satisfying meal
ingredients: Optional: cooked chicken, shrimp, or tofu
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large wok or pan over high heat.
Scramble the eggs in the pan, then remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil, then stir-fry onion and garlic for 1 minute.
Add frozen vegetables and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Add rice, breaking up any clumps with your spatula.
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until rice is heated through.
Add soy sauce and scrambled eggs, toss everything together.
Cook for 1 more minute, then serve hot.

name: Simple Pasta Marinara
description: Classic Italian comfort food ready in 20 minutes
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook pasta according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté for 1 minute until fragrant (don't burn!).
Pour in crushed tomatoes and add dried basil and oregano.
Season with salt and pepper, then simmer for 10 minutes.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add pasta to sauce, tossing to coat. Add pasta water if needed to thin sauce.
Serve topped with fresh basil and parmesan if desired.

name: Easy Chicken Stir-Fry
description: Healthy, colorful stir-fry packed with vegetables
instructions: Mix chicken with 1 tablespoon soy sauce and cornstarch. Let marinate 5 minutes.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a wok over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until cooked through. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return chicken to wok. Add remaining soy sauce and oyster sauce.
Toss everything together for 1-2 minutes.
Serve immediately over hot rice.

name: Fresh Greek Salad
description: Light, refreshing salad with Mediterranean flavors
instructions: Cut all vegetables into bite-sized pieces and place in a large bowl.
Add olives and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently to combine.
Let sit for 5 minutes for flavors to meld.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 2 hours.

name: 3-Ingredient Banana Pancakes
description: Healthy pancakes with just banana, eggs, and oats
instructions: Mash bananas in a bowl until smooth.
Add eggs and oats, mix until well combined (batter will be thin).
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and add a small amount of butter.
Pour 1/4 cup batter for each pancake.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until bubbles form and edges look set.
Flip carefully and cook for another 1-2 minutes.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings.

name: Veggie Quesadilla
description: Crispy, cheesy quesadilla loaded with vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cheese (cheddar or Mexican blend)
Optional: sour cream, salsa, guacamole for serving
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Sauté bell pepper and onion for 3-4 minutes until soft.
Add corn and black beans, cook for 2 more minutes. Remove from heat.
Heat a clean pan or griddle over medium heat.
Place one tortilla on the pan, sprinkle with cheese.
Add a layer of vegetable mixture, then more cheese.
Top with another tortilla and cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden and crispy.
Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream, salsa, or guacamole.

name: Classic Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into 1/4-inch thick rounds.
Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a platter, alternating and overlapping.
Tuck fresh basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Serve immediately at room temperature for best flavor.

name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy Italian pasta with bacon, eggs, and parmesan
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil. Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry bacon in a large pan over medium heat until crispy (5-7 minutes).
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, parmesan, and lots of black pepper.
When pasta is done, reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain.
Add hot pasta to the pan with bacon (off heat). Toss to coat.
Quickly pour in egg mixture while tossing constantly. The heat will cook the eggs into a creamy sauce.
Add pasta water a little at a time if sauce is too thick.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Simple Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C). If you have a pizza stone, put it in to heat.
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to about 12 inches diameter.
Transfer to a pizza pan or parchment paper.
Spread tomato sauce evenly, leaving a 1-inch border for crust.
Arrange mozzarella slices on top. Drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven, top with fresh basil leaves.
Let cool for 2 minutes, slice, and serve.

name: Easy Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and lime
ingredients: 2 tablespoons tamarind paste or lime juice
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20 minutes until soft. Drain.
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar in a small bowl.
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a wok over high heat.
Add shrimp and cook for 2-3 minutes until pink. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil and garlic, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Push to side, crack eggs into wok and scramble.
Add drained noodles and sauce mixture. Toss for 2-3 minutes.
Add shrimp back in, plus bean sprouts and green onions. Toss for 1 minute.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
description: Sweet and savory Japanese chicken over rice with vegetables
ingredients: 500g chicken thighs, cut into bite-sized pieces
instructions: Mix soy sauce, honey, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger in a bowl.
Heat vegetable oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook for 5-7 minutes until golden and cooked through.
While chicken cooks, steam broccoli for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken. Let simmer for 2 minutes.
Mix cornstarch with 2 tablespoons water, add to pan to thicken sauce.
Serve chicken and sauce over rice with steamed broccoli.
Garnish with sesame seeds.

name: Quick Chicken Tacos
description: Flavorful chicken tacos with fresh toppings
instructions: Mix chili powder, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Toss chicken pieces with spice mixture until well coated.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cooked through.
Warm tortillas in a dry pan or microwave for 20 seconds.
Fill each tortilla with chicken.
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve with lime wedges on the side.

name: Fresh Guacamole
description: Creamy avocado dip with lime and cilantro
instructions: Cut avocados in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl.
Mash avocados with a fork to desired consistency (chunky or smooth).
Add lime juice immediately to prevent browning.
Stir in onion, tomato, cilantro, garlic, salt, and cumin.
Mix well and taste. Adjust seasoning if needed.
Serve immediately with tortilla chips.
To store: press plastic wrap directly on surface to prevent browning.

name: Classic French Toast
description: Golden, crispy French toast perfect for weekend brunch
ingredients: 8 slices bread (brioche or thick white bread)
instructions: In a shallow bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon.
Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon butter.
Dip each bread slice into egg mixture, coating both sides but not soaking too long.
Place coated bread on hot skillet. Cook for 2-3 minutes per side until golden brown.
Add more butter as needed for remaining slices.
Serve hot with maple syrup, powdered sugar, and fresh berries if desired.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Trendy and nutritious breakfast with mashed avocado on toast
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden and crispy.
While bread toasts, mash avocados in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread mashed avocado generously on each toast.
Top with cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, or everything bagel seasoning.
Optional: top with a fried or poached egg for extra protein.
Serve immediately while toast is still warm.

name: Creamy Tomato Soup
description: Comforting homemade tomato soup, perfect with grilled cheese
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion and cook for 5 minutes until soft. Add garlic and cook 1 more minute.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Add sugar, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Stir well.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
Use an immersion blender to puree soup until smooth (or transfer to blender in batches).
Stir in heavy cream and heat through (don't boil).
Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil.

name: Classic Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Healing soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and noodles
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onion, carrots, and celery. Cook for 5 minutes until softened.
Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
Pour in chicken broth. Add chicken breasts, bay leaf, and thyme.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove chicken, shred with two forks, and return to pot.
Add noodles and cook for 8-10 minutes until tender.
Season with salt and pepper. Remove bay leaf.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

name: Microwave Chocolate Mug Cake
description: Single-serving chocolate cake ready in 2 minutes
ingredients: Optional: chocolate chips, ice cream for serving
instructions: In a large microwave-safe mug, mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and salt.
Add egg and mix well with a fork until smooth.
Stir in milk, oil, and vanilla extract until fully combined.
Optional: add a few chocolate chips on top.
Microwave on high for 1 minute 30 seconds to 2 minutes (time varies by microwave).
Cake should rise and be set in the center. If still wet, microwave for 15 more seconds.
Let cool for 1 minute before eating.
Serve with ice cream or whipped cream if desired.

name: Classic Scrambled Eggs
description: A delicious American recipe with eggs, butter, milk and more. Ready in 5 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: eggs, butter, milk, salt, pepper.
Pour eggs and stir gently.
Cook until just set.
Season and serve.
Serve immediately. Serves 2.

name: Fluffy Pancakes
description: A delicious American recipe with flour, milk, eggs and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder.
Mix dry ingredients.
Whisk wet ingredients separately.
Combine wet and dry gently.
Heat griddle with butter.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Avocado Toast
description: A delicious Modern recipe with bread, avocado, lemon juice and more. Ready in 3 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: bread, avocado, lemon juice, salt, pepper.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately. Serves 1.

name: Overnight Oats
description: A delicious International recipe with rolled oats, milk, yogurt and more. Ready in 0 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: rolled oats, milk, yogurt, honey, berries.
Mix oats, milk, and yogurt.
Add chia seeds and honey.
Serve immediately. Serves 1.

name: French Toast
description: A delicious French recipe with bread, eggs, milk and more. Ready in 10 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, cinnamon, vanilla extract.
Dip bread slices in egg mixture.
Cook bread until golden on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup.
Serve immediately. Serves 2.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
description: A delicious Italian recipe with spaghetti, garlic, olive oil and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, red pepper flakes, parsley.
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Sauté minced garlic in olive oil.
Add red pepper flakes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
description: A delicious Asian recipe with chicken breast, soy sauce, vegetables and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: chicken breast, soy sauce, vegetables, garlic, ginger.
Slice chicken into strips.
Stir fry chicken in sesame oil.
Add minced garlic and ginger.
Pour soy sauce and cook until vegetables tender.
Serve over rice.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: A delicious American recipe with bread, cheese, butter and more. Ready in 5 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: bread, cheese, butter.
Butter outside of bread slices.
Place cheese between slices.
Flip and cook other side.
Serve hot.
Serve immediately. Serves 1.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A delicious Italian recipe with romaine lettuce, caesar dressing, parmesan cheese and more. Ready in 0 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: romaine lettuce, caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, croutons, lemon.
Wash and chop romaine.
Add croutons.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Tacos
description: A delicious Mexican recipe with ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas and more. Ready in 15 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, tomato.
Add taco seasoning and water.
Simmer until thickened.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Algerian Kefta (Meatballs)
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 1 lb Ground Beef, 4 Cloves Crushed Garlic, 1/2 cup Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Ground Beef, 4 Cloves Crushed Garlic, 1/2 cup Onion, To taste Salt, To taste Pepper.
Combine ground beef with 1/2 of the minced garlic and 1 tablespoon chopped onion in a large bowl.
Mix with your hands until fully incorporated.
Shape meat mixture into 1 1/2-inch oblong patties; you should have 12 to 14 meatballs.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat to medium and stir remaining chopped onion into drippings in the skillet.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Arepa Pabellón
description: A delicious Venezulan recipe with 2 Corn Arepa Filled With Mozarella Cheese, 1 Fried Ripe Bananas, 1 Can Black Beans and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
ingredients: 2 Corn Arepa Filled With Mozarella Cheese
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Corn Arepa Filled With Mozarella Cheese, 1 Fried Ripe Bananas, 1 Can Black Beans, 1 Pico De Gallo Sauce, 2kg Shredded Meat.

Prepare the meat in a skillet and add salt and pepper to taste, heat the beans over medium heat in a pan, fry or grill the ripe plantains as indicated on its package and cut the tomato into small cubes.
Reserve these ingredients until filling.
Preheat the grill or pan and grill the arepa, putting it once on each side until they are golden brown.
With the help of a knife, open it by the edge through the middle, creating a space to fill it with the ripe plantain, the beans, meat and chopped tomato.
Serve with a little pico de gallo or guacamole dip sauce.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Arepa pelua
description: A delicious Venezulan recipe with 500g Beef, 1 Onion, 1 Red Pepper and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Beef, 1 Onion, 1 Red Pepper, 2 cloves Garlic, 1 tsp Cumin.
Cook the meat: place the flank steak in a pot with broth or water and salt.
Cook over low heat for about 2 hours, until tender and easy to shred.
Shred the meat: once cooked, drain and shred the meat using two forks.
Prepare the vegetables: sauté chopped onion, bell pepper, and garlic in a little oil.
Add cumin, oregano, paprika, and salt.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Asado
description: A delicious Argentinian recipe with 2kg Mixed Beef Cuts, 4 Chorizo, 2 Morcilla and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2kg Mixed Beef Cuts, 4 Chorizo, 2 Morcilla, To taste Salt.
Season the meat: generously salt the beef cuts.
Add chorizo and morcilla after the beef has been cooking for a while.
Cook to perfection: cook the meat, turning occasionally, until it reaches your desired doneness.
Typically, ribs may take up to 2 hours; thinner cuts will cook faster.
Rest and serve: let the meat rest for about 10 minutes before slicing.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Aussie Burgers
description: A delicious Australian recipe with 500g Lean Minced Steak, 100g Cooked Beetroot, 2 small Naan Bread and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
ingredients: 4 tablespoons Soured cream and chive dip
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Lean Minced Steak, 100g Cooked Beetroot, 2 small Naan Bread, 50g Rocket, 4 tablespoons Soured cream and chive dip.
Work with wet hands to mix in the seasoning.
Sort out your ingredients: slice the beetroot and split the naan breads.
Toast the naans: heat a griddle pan or barbecue.
Add the burgers to the grill or barbecue and cook for 2-3 minutes, then turn and cook the other side for a further 2-3 minutes.
Top with a burger, then a few slices of beetroot and a dollop of soured cream.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1 tsp Soy Sauce, 1 tsp Dry sherry, 1/2 tsp Cornstarch and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tsp Soy Sauce, 1 tsp Dry sherry, 1/2 tsp Cornstarch, 1/8 teaspoon Black Pepper, 1 lb Sirloin steak.
Stir together the beef marinade ingredients (1 teaspoon soy sauce, 1 teaspoon chinese rice wine, 1/2 teaspoon cornstarch, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper) in a medium bowl.
Add the beef slices and stir until coated.
Stir together the sauce ingredients (2 tablespoons oyster sauce, 1 teaspoon chinese rice wine, 1 teaspoon soy sauce, 1/4 cup chicken broth) in a small bowl.
Bring a pot of water to a boil.
Add the broccoli and cook until crisp-tender, about 2 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef and Mustard Pie
description: A delicious British recipe with 1kg Beef, 2 tbs Plain Flour, 2 tbs Rapeseed Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1kg Beef, 2 tbs Plain Flour, 2 tbs Rapeseed Oil, 200ml Red Wine, 400ml Beef Stock.
Preheat the oven to 150c/300f/gas 2.
Heat a large casserole until hot, add half of the rapeseed oil and enough of the beef to just cover the bottom of the casserole.
Fry until browned on each side, then remove and set aside.
Return the beef to the pan, add the wine and cook until the volume of liquid has reduced by half, then add the stock, onion, carrots, thyme and mustard, and season well with salt and pepper.
Remove from the oven, check the seasoning and set aside to cool.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef and Oyster pie
description: A delicious British recipe with 900g Beef, 3 tbs Olive Oil, 3 Shallots and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 900g Beef, 3 tbs Olive Oil, 3 Shallots, 2 cloves minced Garlic, 125g Bacon.
Season the beef cubes with salt and black pepper.
Heat a tablespoon of oil in the frying pan and fry the meat over a high heat.
Add extra oil if the pan seems dry.
In the same pan, add another tablespoon of oil and cook the shallots for 4-5 minutes, then add the garlic and fry for 30 seconds.
Add the bacon and fry until slightly browned.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Asado
description: A delicious Filipino recipe with 1.5kg Beef, 1 Beef Stock Concentrate, 8 ounces Tomato Puree and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1.5kg Beef, 1 Beef Stock Concentrate, 8 ounces Tomato Puree, 3 cups Water, 6 tablespoons Soy Sauce.
Combine beef, crushed peppercorn, soy sauce, vinegar, dried bay leaves, lemon, and tomato sauce.
Put the marinated beef in a cooking pot along with remaining marinade.
Cover the pot and cook for 40 minutes in low heat.
Continue cooking until beef tenderizes.
Fry the potato until it browns.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Banh Mi Bowls with Sriracha Mayo, Carrot & Pickled Cucumber
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with White Rice, 1 Onion, 1 Lime and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: White Rice, 1 Onion, 1 Lime, 3 Garlic Clove, 1 Cucumber.
Add'l ingredients: mayonnaise, siracha.
Add to a small pot with 1 cup water (2 cups for 4 servings) and a pinch of salt.
Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce heat to low.
Cook until rice is tender, 15 minutes.
Keep covered off heat for at least 10 minutes or until ready to serve.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: A delicious French recipe with 3 tsp Goose Fat, 600g Beef Shin, 100g Bacon and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 tsp Goose Fat, 600g Beef Shin, 100g Bacon, 350g Challots, 250g Chestnut Mushroom.
Heat a large casserole pan and add 1 tbsp goose fat.
Season the beef and fry until golden brown, about 3-5 mins, then turn over and fry the other side until the meat is browned all over, adding more fat if necessary.
In the same pan, fry the bacon, shallots or pearl onions, mushrooms, garlic and bouquet garni until lightly browned.
Mix in the tomato purée and cook for a few mins, stirring into the mixture.
Then return the beef and any drained juices to the pan and stir through.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Caldereta
description: A delicious Filipino recipe with 2kg cut cubes Beef, 1 Beef Stock, 1 tbs Soy Sauce and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2kg cut cubes Beef, 1 Beef Stock, 1 tbs Soy Sauce, 2 cups Water, 1 sliced Green Pepper.
Heat oil in a cooking pot.
Pour tomato sauce and water.
Cover the pressure cooker.
Pan-fry carrot and potato until it browns.
Add chili pepper, liver spread and peanut butter.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Empanadas
description: A delicious Uruguayan recipe with 60g Lard, 340g Water, 1 tsp Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 60g Lard, 340g Water, 1 tsp Salt, 600g All purpose flour, 3 Tomato.
For the dough place lard, warm water and salt in a large kneading bowl and stir.
Add flour and oregano and either knead five miutes by hand or with the kneading function of your machine.
For the filling place tomatoes for about 30 seconds in boiling water, then cool with cold water and peel of skin and cut into cubes.
Simmer garlic and onions in some olive oil until translucent.
Take out onions and garlic and brown the meat at high heat from all sides.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Lo Mein
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1/2 lb Beef, pinch Salt, pinch Pepper and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/2 lb Beef, pinch Salt, pinch Pepper, 2 tsp Sesame Seed Oil, 1/2 Egg.
In a bowl, add the beef, salt, 1 pinch white pepper, 1 teaspoon sesame seed oil, 1/2 egg, corn starch,1 tablespoon of oil and mix together.
Step 2 - boiling the the noodles.
In a 6 qt pot add your noodles to boiling water until the noodles are submerged and boil on high heat for 10 seconds.
After your noodles is done boiling strain and cool with cold water.
Add 2 tablespoons of oil, beef and cook on high heat untill beef is medium cooked.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Mandi
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 1 kg Basmati Rice, 5 Cups Beef Stock, 2 medium Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 kg Basmati Rice, 5 Cups Beef Stock, 2 medium Onion, 5 chopped cloves Garlic, 2 Green Chilli.
Season lightly with salt and turmeric.
Heat ghee/oil in a large pot.
Add sliced onions and sauté until light golden.
Add garlic, green chilies, and tomato; cook until softened.
Add the mandi spice mix: coriander, cumin, black pepper, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, and bay leaves.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Mechado
description: A delicious Filipino recipe with 3 cloves Garlic, 1 sliced Onion, 2 Lbs Beef and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 cloves Garlic, 1 sliced Onion, 2 Lbs Beef, 8 ounces Tomato Puree, 1 cup Water.
Add the cubed beef tenderloin to the bowl with the beef tenderloin marinade.
Heat-up the grill and start grilling the beef kebobs for 3 minutes per side.
Add more time if you want your beef well done, but it will be less tender.
Serve with saffron rice.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef pho
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with 1 L Beef Stock, 1 large Onion, 1 Large Chopped Ginger and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 L Beef Stock, 1 large Onion, 1 Large Chopped Ginger, 1 Cinnamon Stick, 2 Star Anise.
Sit the onion and ginger in a frying pan over a high heat and char on all sides, around 3-5 mins (you can also do this under your grill).
Once charred, add to the beef stock.
In the same pan, toast the spices for 2-3 mins and once they begin to smell fragrant, add them to the beef stock as well.
Bring the stock to the boil, then turn to a simmer and cook for 30mins before straining.

Meanwhile, cut the fat from the steak and wrap in cling film, then put into the freezer for 15 mins – this will make your steak really easy to slice! slice it thinly, then cover with cling film again and pop into the fridge.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beef Rendang
description: A delicious Malaysian recipe with 1lb Beef, 5 tbs Vegetable Oil, 1 Cinnamon Stick and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1lb Beef, 5 tbs Vegetable Oil, 1 Cinnamon Stick, 3 Cloves, 3 Star Anise.
Chop the spice paste ingredients and then blend it in a food processor until fine.
Heat the oil in a stew pot, add the spice paste, cinnamon, cloves, star anise, and cardamom and stir-fry until aromatic.
Add the beef and the pounded lemongrass and stir for 1 minute.
Add the coconut milk, tamarind juice, water, and simmer on medium heat, stirring frequently until the meat is almost cooked.
Add the kaffir lime leaves, kerisik (toasted coconut), sugar or palm sugar, stirring to blend well with the meat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: 15-minute chicken & halloumi burgers
description: A delicious American recipe with 2 Chicken Breasts, 1 tbsp Oil, 4 tbsp Hotsauce and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Chicken Breasts, 1 tbsp Oil, 4 tbsp Hotsauce, ½ Lemon Juice, 2 Buns.
If you're using a frying pan, heat two frying pans over medium-high heat, with one of them containing oil.
Fry the chicken in the oiled pan for 3-4 mins on each side until they are cooked through.
Season the chicken, reduce the heat, drizzle in the chilli sauce and half of the lemon juice, and cook for an additional 1-2 mins until the sauce is reduced.
Remove the chicken from the heat.
If you're using an air-fryer, preheat it to 180c for 4 mins.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Ayam Percik
description: A delicious Malaysian recipe with 6 Chicken Thighs, 16 Challots, 1 1/2 Ginger and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 6 Chicken Thighs, 16 Challots, 1 1/2 Ginger, 6 Garlic Clove, 8 Cayenne Pepper.
In a blender, add the ingredients for the spice paste and blend until smooth.
Over medium heat, pour the spice paste in a skillet or pan and fry for 10 minutes until fragrant.
Add water or oil 1 tablespoon at a time if the paste becomes too dry.
Add the cloves, cardamom, tamarind pulp, coconut milk, water, sugar and salt.
Turn the heat up and bring the mixture to boil.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Brown Stew Chicken
description: A delicious Jamaican recipe with 1 whole Chicken, 1 chopped Tomato, 2 chopped Onions and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 whole Chicken, 1 chopped Tomato, 2 chopped Onions, 2 chopped Garlic Clove, 1 chopped Red Pepper.
Combine tomato, scallion, onion, garlic, pepper, thyme, pimento and soy sauce in a large bowl with the chicken pieces.
Heat oil in a dutch pot or large saucepan.
Shake off the seasonings as you remove each piece of chicken from the marinade.
Reserve the marinade for sauce.
Pour the marinade over the chicken and add the carrots.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chick-Fil-A Sandwich
description: A delicious American recipe with 1 Chicken Breast, 1/4 cup Pickle Juice, 1 Egg and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 Chicken Breast, 1/4 cup Pickle Juice, 1 Egg, 1/4 cup Milk, 1/2 cup Flour.
Marinate in the pickle juice for 30 minutes to one hour (add a teaspoon of tabasco sauce now for a spicy sandwich).
Combine the flour, sugar, and spices in another bowl.
Heat the oil in a skillet (1/2 inch deep) to about 345-350.
Fry each cutlet for 2 minutes on each side, or until golden and cooked through.
Blot on paper and serve on toasted buns with pickle slices.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken & chorizo rice pot
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 1 tblsp Oil, 1 whole Chicken, 1 Large Chopped Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tblsp Oil, 1 whole Chicken, 1 Large Chopped Onion, 1 chopped Red Pepper, 3 Cloves Crushed Garlic.
Heat the oil in a large flameproof casserole dish and brown the chicken pieces on all sides – you may have to do this in batches.
Lower the heat, add the onion and pepper, and gently cook for 10 mins until softened.
Add the garlic and chorizo, and cook for a further 2 mins until the chorizo has released some of its oils into the dish.
Stir in the tomato purée and cook for 1 min more.
Bring the liquid to a boil, cover the dish with a tight-fitting lid and lower the heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken & mushroom Hotpot
description: A delicious British recipe with 50g Butter, 1 chopped Onion, 100g Mushrooms and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Butter, 1 chopped Onion, 100g Mushrooms, 40g Plain Flour, 1 Chicken Stock Cube.
Heat oven to 200c/180c fan/gas 6.
Put the butter in a medium-size saucepan and place over a medium heat.
Add the onion and leave to cook for 5 mins, stirring occasionally.
Add the mushrooms to the saucepan with the onions.
Once the onion and mushrooms are almost cooked, stir in the flour – this will make a thick paste called a roux.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Alfredo Primavera
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 2 tablespoons Butter, 3 tablespoons Olive Oil, 5 boneless Chicken and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tablespoons Butter, 3 tablespoons Olive Oil, 5 boneless Chicken, 1 teaspoon Salt, 1 cut into 1/2-inch cubes Squash.
Heat 1 tablespoon of butter and 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Season both sides of each chicken breast with seasoned salt and a pinch of pepper.
Add the chicken to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes on each side, or until cooked through.
While the chicken is cooking, bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Season the boiling water with a few generous pinches of kosher salt.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Basquaise
description: A delicious French recipe with 1.5kg Chicken, 25g Butter, 6 tblsp Olive Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1.5kg Chicken, 25g Butter, 6 tblsp Olive Oil, 2 sliced Red Onions, 3 Large Red Pepper.
Preheat the oven to 180°c/gas mark 4.
Have the chicken joints ready to cook.
Heat the butter and 3 tbsp olive oil in a flameproof casserole or large frying pan.
Brown the chicken pieces in batches on both sides, seasoning them with salt and pepper as you go.
Don't crowd the pan - fry the chicken in small batches, removing the pieces to kitchen paper as they are done.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Congee
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 8 oz Chicken, pinch Salt, pinch Pepper and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 8 oz Chicken, pinch Salt, pinch Pepper, 1 tsp Ginger Cordial, 1 tsp Ginger.
In a bowl, add chicken, salt, white pepper, ginger juice and then mix it together well.
Step 2 - boiling the white rice.
Next add 8 cups of water and then set the stove on high heat until it is boiling.
Once rice porridge starts to boil, set the stove on low heat and then stir it once every 8-10 minutes for around 20-25 minutes.
After 25 minutes, this is optional but you can add a little bit more water to make rice porridge to make it less thick or to your preference.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Couscous
description: A delicious Moroccan recipe with 1 tbsp Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 200g Chicken Breast and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tbsp Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 200g Chicken Breast, pinch Ginger, 2 tblsp Harissa Spice.
Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan and cook the onion for 1-2 mins just until softened.
Add the chicken and fry for 7-10 mins until cooked through and the onions have turned golden.
Grate over the ginger, stir through the harissa to coat everything and cook for 1 min more.
Tip in the apricots, chickpeas and couscous, then pour over the stock and stir once.
Fluff up the couscous with a fork and scatter over the coriander to serve.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Fajita Mac and Cheese
description: A delicious American recipe with 500g macaroni, 2 cups chicken stock, 1/2 cup heavy cream and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g macaroni, 2 cups chicken stock, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 packet fajita seasoning, 1 tsp salt.
Fry your onion, peppers and garlic in olive oil until nicely translucent.
Make a well in your veg and add your chicken.
Add your seasoning and salt.
Add your cream, stock and macaroni.
Cook on low for 20 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1 lb Chicken Thighs, 1 tsp Salt, 3  tablespoons Canola Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Chicken Thighs, 1 tsp Salt, 3  tablespoons Canola Oil, 3 Large Egg, 2/3 Cup Onion.
If you don’t have any leftover rice from the night before, cook a batch of rice and spread it on a large baking sheet or several large plates.
I usually cook stir-fries in my seasoned carbon steel wok, but cast iron or nonstick pans work well, too.
You might need to add a little more oil if things aren’t releasing easily.
Chop the chicken into small 1/4-inch to 1/2-inch cubes.
Sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon of salt over the chicken and mix to combine.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Ham and Leek Pie
description: A delicious British recipe with 450ml Chicken Stock, 3 Chicken Breast, 75g Butter and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 450ml Chicken Stock, 3 Chicken Breast, 75g Butter, 2 sliced Leek, 2 cloves minced Garlic.
Heat the chicken stock in a lidded saucepan.
Add the chicken breast and bring to a low simmer.
Cover with a lid and cook for 10 minutes.
Pour the cooking liquor into a large jug.
Melt 25g/1oz of the butter in a large heavy-based saucepan over a low heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Handi
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 1.2 kg Chicken, 5 thinly sliced Onion, 2 finely chopped Tomatoes and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1.2 kg Chicken, 5 thinly sliced Onion, 2 finely chopped Tomatoes, 8 cloves chopped Garlic, 1 tbsp Ginger paste.
Take a large pot or wok, big enough to cook all the chicken, and heat the oil in it.
Once the oil is hot, add sliced onion and fry them until deep golden brown.
To the same pot, add the chopped garlic and sauté for a minute.
Then add the chopped tomatoes and cook until tomatoes turn soft.
Then return the fried onion to the pot and stir.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Karaage
description: A delicious Japanese recipe with 450 grams Boneless skin Chicken, 1 tablespoon Ginger, 1 clove Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 450 grams Boneless skin Chicken, 1 tablespoon Ginger, 1 clove Garlic, 2 tablespoons Soy sauce, 1 tablespoon Sake.
Add the ginger, garlic, soy sauce, sake and sugar to a bowl and whisk to combine.
Add the chicken, then stir to coat evenly.
Add 1 inch of vegetable oil to a heavy bottomed pot and heat until the oil reaches 360 degrees f.
Add a handful of chicken to the potato starch and toss to coat each piece evenly.
Fry the karaage in batches until the exterior is a medium brown and the chicken is cooked through.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Mandi
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 1 Chicken, 2 cups Basmati Rice, 4 cups Water and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 Chicken, 2 cups Basmati Rice, 4 cups Water, 1 large Onion, 4 cloves Garlic.
In a large pot, heat ghee/oil.
Fry chopped onion until golden.
Add minced garlic and green chillies and fry 1–2 min.
Add whole spices (cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, bay leaves) and ground spices (coriander, cumin).
Add chicken pieces, brown lightly and add enough water/chicken stock to cover.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Marengo
description: A delicious French recipe with 1 tbs Olive Oil, 300g Mushrooms, 4 Chicken Legs and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tbs Olive Oil, 300g Mushrooms, 4 Chicken Legs, 500g Passata, 1 Chicken Stock Cube.
Heat the oil in a large flameproof casserole dish and stir-fry the mushrooms until they start to soften.
Add the chicken legs and cook briefly on each side to colour them a little.
Pour in the passata, crumble in the stock cube and stir in the olives.
Season with black pepper – you shouldn’t need salt.
Cover and simmer for 40 mins until the chicken is tender.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Parmentier
description: A delicious French recipe with 1.5kg Potatoes, 30g Butter, 5 tblsp Double Cream and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1.5kg Potatoes, 30g Butter, 5 tblsp Double Cream, 2 Egg Yolks, 30g Butter.
For the topping, boil the potatoes in salted water until tender.
Stir in the butter, cream and egg yolks.
Add the shallots, carrots and celery and gently fry until soft, then add the garlic.
Pour in the wine and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the tomato purée, chopped tomatoes and stock and cook for 10–15 minutes, until thickened.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chicken Quinoa Greek Salad
description: A delicious Greek recipe with 225g Quinoa, 25g Butter, 1 chopped Red Chilli and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 225g Quinoa, 25g Butter, 1 chopped Red Chilli, 1 clove finely chopped Garlic, 400g Chicken Breast.
Cook the quinoa following the pack instructions, then rinse in cold water and drain thoroughly.
Meanwhile, mix the butter, chilli and garlic into a paste.
Toss the chicken fillets in 2 tsp of the olive oil with some seasoning.
Lay in a hot griddle pan and cook for 3-4 mins each side or until cooked through.
Toss in the cooked quinoa.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Æbleskiver
description: A delicious Norwegian recipe with 2 cups Flour, 1 teaspoon Salt, 2 tblsp Granulated Sugar and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 cups Flour, 1 teaspoon Salt, 2 tblsp Granulated Sugar, 1 teaspoon Baking Powder, 1/2 teaspoon Cardamom.
Whisk the flour, salt, sugar, baking soda, and cardamom together in a large bowl.
Separate the eggs and add the egg yolks to the flour mixture.
Pour in the buttermilk (or cultured milk) and whisk the batter together until smooth.
Use a hand (or stand) mixer to beat the egg whites until stiff.
Heat the pan on medium heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Alfajores
description: A delicious Argentinian recipe with 300g All purpose flour, 200g Cornstarch, 200g Butter and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 300g All purpose flour, 200g Cornstarch, 200g Butter, 100g Sugar, 2 Egg Yolks.
Add egg yolks and lemon zest.
Gradually mix in flour and cornstarch to form a dough.
Bake the cookies: roll out the dough, cut into circles, and bake at 180°c (350°f) for 12-15 minutes.
Assemble: spread dulce de leche on one cookie, then sandwich with another.
Chill the dough before rolling it out to make it easier to handle and to prevent the cookies from spreading too much while baking.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Anzac biscuits
description: A delicious Australian recipe with 85g Porridge oats, 85g Desiccated Coconut, 100g Plain Flour and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 85g Porridge oats, 85g Desiccated Coconut, 100g Plain Flour, 100g Caster Sugar, 100g Butter.
Heat oven to 180c/fan 160c/gas 4.
Melt the butter in a small pan and stir in the golden syrup.
Add the bicarbonate of soda to 2 tbsp boiling water, then stir into the golden syrup and butter mixture.
Make a well in the middle of the dry ingredients and pour in the butter and golden syrup mixture.
Stir gently to incorporate the dry ingredients.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Apam balik
description: A delicious Malaysian recipe with 200ml Milk, 60ml Oil, 2 Eggs and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 200ml Milk, 60ml Oil, 2 Eggs, 1600g Flour, 3 tsp Baking Powder.
Mix milk, oil and egg together.
Sift flour, baking powder and salt into the mixture.
Stir well until all ingredients are combined evenly.
Add butter, cream corn, crushed peanuts and sugar onto the pancake.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Apple & Blackberry Crumble
description: A delicious British recipe with 120g Plain Flour, 60g Caster Sugar, 60g Butter and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 120g Plain Flour, 60g Caster Sugar, 60g Butter, 300g Braeburn Apples, 30g Butter.
Heat oven to 190c/170c fan/gas 5.
Add the butter, then rub into the flour using your fingertips to make a light breadcrumb texture.
Sprinkle the mixture evenly over a baking sheet and bake for 15 mins or until lightly coloured.
Meanwhile, for the compote, peel, core and cut the apples into 2cm dice.
Put the butter and sugar in a medium saucepan and melt together over a medium heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Apple cake
description: A delicious Dutch recipe with 4 Eggs, 200g Sugar, 200g Self-raising Flour and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 Eggs, 200g Sugar, 200g Self-raising Flour, 200g Melted Butter, 1 tsp Vanilla Extract.
Preheat the oven to 180°c.
Sift the self-rising baking flour and add it to your egg mixture.
Add the melted (and slightly cooled) butter and mix until combined.
Add cinnamon, pinch of salt and vanilla extract.
Add the diced apple to the batter and gently fold them into the batter so that the apple pieces are evenly distributed.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Apricot & Turkish delight mess
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 100g Mascarpone, 50g Greek Yogurt, 25g Icing Sugar and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 100g Mascarpone, 50g Greek Yogurt, 25g Icing Sugar, 2 tablespoons Orange Blossom Water, 1 Meringue Nests.
Place the mascarpone, yogurt, sugar and orange flower water into a large bowl and whisk until thickened.
Fold the remaining ingredients through, then divide the mix between 2 dessert glasses or bowls and decorate with extra mint, if you like.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Authentic Norwegian Kransekake
description: A delicious Norwegian recipe with 3 Cups Almonds, 4 Egg White, 4 cups Powdered Sugar and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Cups Almonds, 4 Egg White, 4 cups Powdered Sugar, 2 cups Powdered Sugar, 1 Egg White.
Mix almonds and powdered sugar together in a large mixing bowl.
Add three of the egg whites and knead the dough together with your hands until it comes together in a ball.
Preheat oven to 210°c (410°f) top and bottom heat.
Slowly add the remaining egg white to the dough and knead it until you can roll it into long sausages about as thick as your index finger.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Baklava with spiced nuts, ricotta & chocolate
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 500g Sugar, To taste Lemon Juice, 300g Walnuts and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Sugar, To taste Lemon Juice, 300g Walnuts, 200g Pecan Nuts, 100g Almonds.
Stir over a low heat until the sugar has dissolved, then turn up the heat and bring to the boil.
Reduce the heat to a simmer and cook for 15 mins, then squeeze in a few drops of lemon juice and simmer for a further 5 mins.
Remove from the heat and leave to cool.
Meanwhile, for assembling the baklava later, melt the butter in a small pan over a low heat for 5 mins, skimming and discarding any froth that rises to the surface.
For the filling, crush all of the nuts in a pestle and mortar, or blitz in a food processor – you want a mixture of finely ground nuts with a few chunky pieces.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Banana Pancakes
description: A delicious American recipe with 1 large Banana, 2 medium Eggs, pinch Baking Powder and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 large Banana, 2 medium Eggs, pinch Baking Powder, spinkling Vanilla Extract, 1 tsp Oil.
Stir in the eggs, baking powder and vanilla.
Heat a large non-stick frying pan or pancake pan over a medium heat and brush with half the oil.
Using half the batter, spoon two pancakes into the pan, cook for 1-2 mins each side, then tip onto a plate.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Battenberg Cake
description: A delicious British recipe with 175g Butter, 175g Caster Sugar, 140g Self-raising Flour and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 175g Butter, 175g Caster Sugar, 140g Self-raising Flour, 50g Almonds, ½ tsp Baking Powder.
Heat oven to 180c/160c fan/gas 4 and line the base and sides of a 20cm square tin with baking parchment (the easiest way is to cross 2 x 20cm-long strips over the base).
Beat with an electric whisk until the mix comes together smoothly.
Scrape into the tin, spreading to the corners, and bake for 25-30 mins – when you poke in a skewer, it should come out clean.
Mix all the ingredients together as above, but don’t add the almond extract.
Then scrape it all into the tin and bake as before.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: BeaverTails
description: A delicious Canadian recipe with 1/2 cup Water, 2 parts Yeast, 1/2 cup Sugar and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/2 cup Water, 2 parts Yeast, 1/2 cup Sugar, 1/2 cup Milk, 6 tblsp Butter.
In the bowl of a stand mixer, add warm water, a big pinch of sugar and yeast.
Into the same bowl, add 1/2 cup sugar, warm milk, melted butter, eggs and salt, and whisk until combined.
Place a dough hook on the mixer, add the flour with the machine on, until a smooth but slightly sticky dough forms.
In a large, deep pot, heat oil to 350 degrees.
Gently place beavertail dough into hot oil and cook for 30 to 45 seconds on each side until golden brown.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beetroot pancakes
description: A delicious Ukrainian recipe with 3 Beetroot, 50 ml Milk, 200g Self-raising Flour and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Beetroot, 50 ml Milk, 200g Self-raising Flour, 1 tsp Baking Powder, 2 tablespoons Maple Syrup.
Put the beetroot in a jug with the milk and blend with a stick blender until smooth.
Pour into a bowl with the rest of the pancake ingredients and whisk until smooth and vibrant purple.
Put a small knob of butter in a large non-stick frying pan and heat over a medium-low heat until melted and foamy.
Cook for 2-3 mins then flip over and cook for a further minute until cooked through.
Heat oven to lowest setting and keep the pancakes warm in there until needed.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Blackberry Fool
description: A delicious British recipe with 50g Hazlenuts, 125g Butter, 150g Caster Sugar and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Hazlenuts, 125g Butter, 150g Caster Sugar, Grated Lemon, 150g Plain Flour.
For the biscuits, preheat the oven to 200c/180c (fan)/gas 6 and line two large baking trays with baking parchment.
Roughly chop the cooled nuts and add to the creamed butter and sugar, along with the lemon zest, flour and baking powder.
Stir well until the mixture comes together and forms a ball – you may need to use your hands.
Bake the biscuits, one tray at a time, for 12 minutes or until very pale golden-brown.
Stir in the lemon juice and heat gently for two minutes, or until the blackberries begin to soften and release their juices.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Blueberry & lemon friands
description: A delicious Australian recipe with 100g Unsalted Butter, 125g Icing Sugar, 25g Flour and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 100g Unsalted Butter, 125g Icing Sugar, 25g Flour, 85g Almonds, 3 Egg White.
Preheat the oven to fan 180c/conventional 200c/gas 6.
Add the almonds and mix everything between your fingers.
Whisk the egg whites in another bowl until they form a light, floppy foam.
Make a well in the centre of the dry ingredients, tip in the egg whites and lemon rind, then lightly stir in the butter to form a soft batter.
Sprinkle a handful of blueberries over each cake and bake for 15-20 minutes until just firm to the touch and golden brown.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bread and Butter Pudding
description: A delicious British recipe with 25g/1oz butter, 8 thin slices bread, 50g/2oz sultanas and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 25g/1oz butter, 8 thin slices bread, 50g/2oz sultanas, 2 tsp cinnamon, 350ml/12fl milk.
Spread each slice with on one side with butter, then cut into triangles.
Arrange a layer of bread, buttered-side up, in the bottom of the dish, then add a layer of sultanas.
Gently warm the milk and cream in a pan over a low heat to scalding point.
Crack the eggs into a bowl, add three quarters of the sugar and lightly whisk until pale.
Add the warm milk and cream mixture and stir well, then strain the custard into a bowl.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Budino Di Ricotta
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 500g Ricotta, 4 large Eggs, 3 tbs Flour and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Ricotta, 4 large Eggs, 3 tbs Flour, 250g Sugar, 1 tsp Cinnamon.
Mash the ricotta and beat well with the egg yolks, stir in the flour, sugar, cinnamon, grated lemon rind and the rum and mix well.
Beat the egg whites until stiff, fold in and pour into a buttered and floured 25cm cake tin.
Bake in the oven at 180ºc/160ºc fan/gas 4 for about 40 minutes, or until it is firm.
Serve hot or cold dusted with icing sugar.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Canadian Butter Tarts
description: A delicious Canadian recipe with 375g Shortcrust Pastry, 2 large Eggs, 175g Muscovado Sugar and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 375g Shortcrust Pastry, 2 large Eggs, 175g Muscovado Sugar, 100g Raisins, 1 tsp Vanilla Extract.
Preheat the oven to fan 170c/ conventional 190c/gas 5.
Beat the eggs in a large bowl and combine with the rest of the ingredients except the walnuts.
Tip this mixture into a pan and stir continuously for 3-4 minutes until the butter melts, and the mixture bubbles and starts to thicken.
Don’t overcook, and be sure to stir all the time as the mixture can easily burn.
Remove from the heat and stir in the nuts.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Adana kebab
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 2 large Romano Pepper, 800g Lamb Mince, 3  tablespoons Red Pepper Paste and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 large Romano Pepper, 800g Lamb Mince, 3  tablespoons Red Pepper Paste, 1 tablespoon Pul Biber, 3  tablespoons Sunflower Oil.
Finely chop the peppers in a food processor, then tip them in a sieve and press into the sieve so that the peppers release all of their juices.
Mix together, kneading well for at least 2-3 mins.
If you need to, wet your hands with cold water to prevent the mixture from sticking.
The mixture should be sticky when ready.
When ready to cook, heat the grill to high or an oven to 220c/200c fan/gas 6.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chilli ginger lamb chops
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 4 Cloves Crushed Garlic, 1 tblsp Ginger, 1 tblsp Lemon Juice and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 Cloves Crushed Garlic, 1 tblsp Ginger, 1 tblsp Lemon Juice, 1 tblsp Olive Oil, 1/2 tsp Chili Powder.
Put the garlic in a bowl with the ginger, lemon juice, oil, spices and seasoning.
Blitz with a hand blender until smooth, then use to coat the lamb chops on both sides.
Heat a barbecue until hot.
Barbecue the chops over the coals for 3 mins on each side until cooked but still pink and juicy in the centre.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chorba Hamra bel Frik (Algerian Lamb, Tomato, and Freekeh Soup)
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 1 cup Freekeh, 12 ounces Lamb, 1 finely chopped Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 cup Freekeh, 12 ounces Lamb, 1 finely chopped Onion, 1 tsp Black Pepper, 1 tsp Paprika.
Combine lamb, onion, black pepper, paprika, cinnamon, and salt in a pot.
Stir in oil, 1/2 the cilantro, 1/2 the mint, and celery stalk until combined.
Simmer over low heat for 15 minutes.
Stir in chickpeas; pour in just enough water to cover, and return to a simmer.
Stir in zucchini, carrot, and tomato paste.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fårikål (Norwegian National Dish)
description: A delicious Norwegian recipe with 3 Lbs Lamb, 1 head White Cabbage, 3  tablespoons Whole black peppercorns and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Lbs Lamb, 1 head White Cabbage, 3  tablespoons Whole black peppercorns, 3 tsp Salt, 1 1/2 cups Water.
Slice the cabbage into large wedges, keeping the core attached.
Add a layer of lamb pieces to the bottom of a large pot, fatty side down.
Add a layer of cabbage wedges on top.
Add water to the pot and bring to a boil.
Cover and reduce heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Hot cumin lamb wrap with crunchy slaw & spicy mayo
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 4 small Lamb Leg, 2 tsp Olive Oil, 1 tsp Ground Cumin and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 small Lamb Leg, 2 tsp Olive Oil, 1 tsp Ground Cumin, 1 tablespoon Sugar, 3  tablespoons White Wine Vinegar.
Rub the lamb steaks with the oil, cumin and some seasoning.
Griddle for about 3-4 mins on each side or until cooked to your liking.
In a large bowl, stir the sugar into the vinegar until dissolved.
Add the carrots, spring onions, cabbage and some seasoning, and toss together.
Add a heap of the salad to each flatbread.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Imam bayildi with BBQ lamb & tzatziki
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 3 Aubergine, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Aubergine, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 2 cloves chopped Garlic, 1 tsp Cinnamon.
Heat oven to 190c/170c fan/gas 5.
Fry the onion in a little oil until soft, add the garlic and cinnamon and fry for 1 min.
Roughly chop the flesh and add it to the onions.
Halve the tomatoes, scoop the seeds and juice into a sieve set over a bowl, then chop the flesh.
Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook everything for 10 mins until nice and soft.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Keleya Zaara
description: A delicious Tunisian recipe with 4 tbs Olive Oil, 750g Lamb, 1 1/2 tsp Saffron and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 tbs Olive Oil, 750g Lamb, 1 1/2 tsp Saffron, 1 Large Chopped Onion, 25 ml Water.
Heat the vegetable oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat.
Add the lamb and cook until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes.
Season with saffron, salt and pepper to taste; stir in all but 4 tablespoons of the onion, and pour in the water.
Bring to the boil, then cover, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until the lamb is tender, about 15 minutes.
Uncover the pan, stir in the butter and allow the sauce reduce 5 to 10 minutes to desired consistency.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: kofta burgers
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 1kg Lamb, 2 Onion, 1 Garlic Bulb and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1kg Lamb, 2 Onion, 1 Garlic Bulb, 6 tablespoons Garam Masala, Bunch Coriander.
Roll up your sleeves, get your hands into the mix and squelch everything together through your fingers until completely mixed.
Pat the mix into 16 small burgers.
To cook, heat grill to its highest setting and lay the burgers in a single layer on a baking tray (you may need to do this in batches, depending on how big your tray is).
Grill on the highest shelf for 5-6 mins on each side until browned and cooked through.
Pile burgers onto a platter and serve with all the accompaniments, so everyone can construct their own sandwich.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb & apricot meatballs
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 chopped Red Onions, 4 Cloves Crushed Garlic and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 2 chopped Red Onions, 4 Cloves Crushed Garlic, 2 tsp Ground Cumin, 2 tsp Ground Coriander.
Heat 2 tsp oil in a pan and soften the onions for 5 mins.
Add the garlic and spices and cook for a few mins more.
Spoon half the onion mixture into a bowl and set aside to cool.
Add the tomatoes, sugar and seasoning to the remaining onions in the pan and simmer for about 10 mins until reduced.
Meanwhile, add the mint, lamb, apricots and breadcrumbs to the cooled onions, season and mix well with your hands.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb and Lemon Souvlaki
description: A delicious Greek recipe with 2 cloves Garlic, 2 tsp Sea Salt, 4 tbs Olive Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 cloves Garlic, 2 tsp Sea Salt, 4 tbs Olive Oil, Zest and juice of 1 Lemon, 1 tbs Dill.
Whisk together the oil, lemon juice, zest, dill and garlic.
Mix in the lamb and combine well.
If you’ve prepared the lamb the previous day, take it out of the fridge 30 mins before cooking.
Heat the grill to high or have a hot griddle pan or barbecue ready.
Cook the skewers for 2-3 mins on each side, basting with the remaining marinade.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb and Potato pie
description: A delicious British recipe with 500g Lamb Shoulder, 1 tbls Flour, Dash Vegetable Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Lamb Shoulder, 1 tbls Flour, Dash Vegetable Oil, 1 sliced Onion, 2 sliced Carrots.
Heat enough vegetable oil in a large saucepan to fill the base, and fry the onion and meat until lightly browned.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the carrots, stock and more seasoning to taste.
Bring to the boil, cover and reduce the heat to a simmer.
Simmer for at least an hour or until the meat is tender.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb Biryani
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 12 Cashew nuts, ½ tbsp Khus khus, ½ tbsp Cumin seeds and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
ingredients: ½ tsp dissolved in ½ cup warm milk Saffron
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 12 Cashew nuts, ½ tbsp Khus khus, ½ tbsp Cumin seeds, 3 sliced thinly Onions, 2 tsp Ginger garlic paste.
Deep fry the sliced onions when it is hot.
Also fry the cashewnuts till golden brown.
Meanwhile, take a big wide pan, add oil in medium heat, add the sliced onions, add the blended paste, to it add the green chillies, ginger garlic paste and garlic and fry for a minute.
Then add the tomatoes and sauté them well till they are cooked and not mushy.
Then to it add the red chilli powder, biryani powder, mint, coriander leaves and sauté them well.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb Pilaf (Plov)
description: A delicious Russian recipe with 50g Lamb, 120g Prunes, 1 tbs Lemon Juice and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Lamb, 120g Prunes, 1 tbs Lemon Juice, 2 tbs Butter, 1 chopped Onion.
Place the raisins and prunes into a small bowl and pour over enough water to cover.
Add lemon juice and let soak for at least 1 hour.
Roughly chop the prunes.
Meanwhile, heat the butter in a large pan, add the onion, and cook for 5 minutes.
Add cubed lamb, ground lamb, and crushed garlic cloves.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb Rogan josh
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 2 quartered Onion, 4 tbsp Sunflower Oil, 4 cloves Garlic and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
ingredients: Thumb sized peeled and very finely grated Ginger
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 quartered Onion, 4 tbsp Sunflower Oil, 4 cloves Garlic, Thumb sized peeled and very finely grated Ginger, 2 tbsp Madras Paste.
Put the onions in a food processor and whizz until very finely chopped.
Heat the oil in a large heavy-based pan, then fry the onion with the lid on, stirring every now and then, until it is really golden and soft.
Add the garlic and ginger, then fry for 5 mins more.
Stir well over the heat for about 30 secs, then add the meat and 300ml water.
Stir to mix, turn down the heat, then add the yogurt.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb Tagine
description: A delicious Moroccan recipe with 2 tblsp Olive Oil, 1 finely sliced Onion, 2 chopped Carrots and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tblsp Olive Oil, 1 finely sliced Onion, 2 chopped Carrots, 500g Lamb Leg, 2 cloves minced Garlic.
Heat the olive oil in a heavy-based pan and add the onion and carrot.
Cook for 3- 4 mins until softened.
Add the diced lamb and brown all over.
Stir in the garlic and all the spices and cook for a few mins more or until the aromas are released.
Add the honey and apricots, crumble in the stock cube and pour over roughly 500ml boiling water or enough to cover the meat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb tomato and sweet spices
description: A delicious Moroccan recipe with 2 tbsp olive oil, 4cm piece finely chopped ginger, 2 cloves peeled and chopped garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
ingredients: 1 small peeled and coarsely grated potatoes
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil, 4cm piece finely chopped ginger, 2 cloves peeled and chopped garlic, 800g peeled and chopped tomatoes, 2 tbsp lemon juice.
Use pickled vine leaves here, preserved in brine.
Drain the preserved leaves, immerse them in boiling water for 10 minutes and then leave to dry on a tea towel before use.
Add half a teaspoon of salt and some black pepper, and stir.
To make the sauce, heat the oil in a medium pan.
Add the ginger and garlic, cook for a minute or two, taking care not to burn them, then add the tomato, lemon juice and sugar.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lamb Tzatziki Burgers
description: A delicious Greek recipe with 25g Bulgur Wheat, 500g Lamb Mince, 1 tsp Cumin and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 25g Bulgur Wheat, 500g Lamb Mince, 1 tsp Cumin, 1 tsp Coriander, 1 tsp Paprika.
Tip the bulghar into a pan, cover with water and boil for 10 mins.
To make the tzatziki, squeeze and discard the juice from the cucumber, then mix into the yogurt with the chopped mint and a little salt.
Work the bulghar into the lamb with the spices, garlic (if using) and seasoning, then shape into 4 burgers.
Brush with a little oil and fry or barbecue for about 5 mins each side until cooked all the way through.
Serve in the buns (toasted if you like) with the tzatziki, tomatoes, onion and a few mint leaves.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lancashire hotpot
description: A delicious British recipe with 100g Butter, 900g Lamb, 3 Lamb Kidney and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 100g Butter, 900g Lamb, 3 Lamb Kidney, 2 medium Onions, 4 sliced Carrots.
Heat oven to 160c/fan 140c/gas 3.
Heat some dripping or butter in a large shallow casserole dish, brown the lamb in batches, lift to a plate, then repeat with the kidneys.
Fry the onions and carrots in the pan with a little more dripping until golden.
Sprinkle over the flour, allow to cook for a couple of mins, shake over the worcestershire sauce, pour in the stock, then bring to the boil.
Stir in the meat and bay leaves, then turn off the heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: McSinghs Scotch pie
description: A delicious British recipe with 2 tsp Cumin, 1 tbs Rapeseed Oil, 2 finely chopped Red Onions and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tsp Cumin, 1 tbs Rapeseed Oil, 2 finely chopped Red Onions, 6 Garlic Clove, 3 finely chopped Green Chilli.
Heat a large frying pan and toast the cumin seeds for a few minutes, then set aside.
Heat the oil in the same pan and fry the onion, garlic, chilli, pepper and a good pinch of salt for around eight minutes, until there is no moisture left.
Remove from the heat, stir in the toasted cumin seeds, ground mace (or nutmeg) and ground coriander.
In a large bowl mix together the minced lamb, white pepper, fresh coriander, and the cooled spiced onion mixture until combined.
Preheat the oven to 200c/400f/gas 6 and generously grease a 20cm/8in diameter loose-bottomed or springform round cake tin with lard.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bean & Sausage Hotpot
description: A delicious British recipe with 8 large Sausages, 1 Jar Tomato Sauce, 1200g Butter Beans and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 8 large Sausages, 1 Jar Tomato Sauce, 1200g Butter Beans, 1 tbls Black Treacle, 1 tsp English Mustard.
In a large casserole, fry the sausages until brown all over – about 10 mins.
Add the tomato sauce, stirring well, then stir in the beans, treacle or sugar and mustard.
Bring to the simmer, cover and cook for 30 mins.
Great served with crusty bread or rice.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Callaloo Jamaican Style
description: A delicious Jamaican recipe with 1  bunch Kale, 2 strips Bacon, 3 cloves Chopped Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1  bunch Kale, 2 strips Bacon, 3 cloves Chopped Garlic, 1 medium Onion, 1/2 tsp Paprika.
Place bacon on saucepan and cook until crispy.
Then add onions, garlic, thyme, stir for about a minute or more.
Add tomatoes; scotch bonnet pepper, smoked paprika.
Sauté for about 2-3 more minutes.
Finally add vegetable, salt, mix well, and steamed for about 6-8 minutes or until leaves are tender.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chakchouka
description: A delicious Tunisian recipe with 4 Tomatoes, 2 tbs Olive Oil, 1 Diced Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 Tomatoes, 2 tbs Olive Oil, 1 Diced Onion, 1 sliced Red Pepper, 1 sliced Green Pepper.
In a large cast iron skillet or sauté pan with a lid, heat oil over medium high heat.
Add the onion and sauté for 2-3 minutes, until softened.
Add the peppers and garlic, and sauté for an additional 3-5 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, cumin, paprika, salt, and chili powder.
Mix well and bring the mixture to a simmer.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Duck Confit
description: A delicious French recipe with Handful Sea Salt, 4 Bay Leaf, 4 cloves Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: Handful Sea Salt, 4 Bay Leaf, 4 cloves Garlic, Handful Thyme, 4 Duck Legs.
Pour the wine into a saucepan that will snugly fit the duck legs in a single layer.
Cover the pan with a lid and place over a medium heat.
As soon as the wine starts to bubble, turn the heat down to the lowest setting and cook for 2 hours, checking occasionally that the liquid is just barely simmering.
(if you own a heat diffuser, it would be good to use it here.
The duck legs are now cooked and can be eaten immediately – or you can follow the next step if you like them crisp.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: French Lentils With Garlic and Thyme
description: A delicious French recipe with 3 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 Onion, 2 cloves Garlic and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 Onion, 2 cloves Garlic, 1 Carrots, 2 1/4 cups French Lentils.
Place a large saucepan over medium heat and add oil.
When hot, add chopped vegetables and sauté until softened, 5 to 10 minutes.
Add 6 cups water, lentils, thyme, bay leaves and salt.
Bring to a boil, then reduce to a fast simmer.
Simmer lentils until they are tender and have absorbed most of the water, 20 to 25 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: French Omelette
description: A delicious French recipe with 3 Eggs, 2 knobs Butter, 1 tsp Parmesan and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Eggs, 2 knobs Butter, 1 tsp Parmesan, 3 chopped Tarragon Leaves, 1 tbs chopped Parsley.
Warm a 20cm (measured across the top) non-stick frying pan on a medium heat.
Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them with a fork so they break up and mix, but not as completely as you would for scrambled egg.
With the heat on medium-hot, drop one knob of butter into the pan.
Season the eggs with the parmesan and a little salt and pepper, and pour into the pan.
Let the eggs bubble slightly for a couple of seconds, then take a wooden fork or spatula and gently draw the mixture in from the sides of the pan a few times, so it gathers in folds in the centre.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Locro
description: A delicious Argentinian recipe with 500g Dried white corn, 200g Dried white beans, 300g Pumpkin and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Dried white corn, 200g Dried white beans, 300g Pumpkin, 200g Potatoes, 300g Beef.
Cook meats: in a large pot, brown the beef and pork.
Add onions and spices, cooking until translucent.
Simmer the stew: add soaked corn and beans, pumpkin, potato, and enough water to cover.
Simmer for 2-3 hours, until thick.
Serve: enjoy hot, with bread on the side.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Migas
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 1 large Bread, 1 1/2 L Olive Oil, Half Garlic and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 large Bread, 1 1/2 L Olive Oil, Half Garlic, 1 Handfull Pork.
Heat 2 tsp of olive oil in a deep pan.
Add the garlic cloves separated, skins on; just make a small cut with a knife to open them and keep frying for 5 minutes.
In the same oil, where we fried everything, simmer the bread, stirring constantly for 15 minutes and add a grinding of black pepper.
Add the garlic, continue stirring for about 20 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Mutabbaq
description: A delicious Saudi Arabian recipe with 500g Mincemeat, 1.5 tbs minced Garlic, 1.5 tbs minced Ginger and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Mincemeat, 1.5 tbs minced Garlic, 1.5 tbs minced Ginger, 1 Egg, 1 large Tomato.
Heat the frying pan and add in some oil.
Fry the mashed garlic and ginger first and then add in the minced meat and all seasoning.
When the meat is cooked, set aside to cool down.
Add in egg, chopped tomato, chopped spring onion and minced meat.
Heat a frying pan and add in some oil to cook the parcel until its both sides and 4 edges all turn into golden brown.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Osso Buco alla Milanese
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 4 meaty shanks Veal, ½ cup Flour, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
ingredients: 1 medium chopped into ½-inch pieces Onion
1 bulb chopped into ½-inch pieces Fennel
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 meaty shanks Veal, ½ cup Flour, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 3 tablespoons Butter, 1 medium chopped into ½-inch pieces Onion.
Heat the oven to 300 degrees.
Dredging the shanks: pour the flour into a shallow dish (a pie plate works nicely).
Season the veal shanks on all sides with salt and pepper.
Browning the shanks: put the oil and 1 tablespoon of the butter in a wide dutch oven or heavy braising pot (6 to 7 quart) and heat over medium-high heat.
If the butter-oil mixture starts to burn, lower the heat just a bit.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Pizza Express Margherita
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 150ml Water, 1 tsp Sugar, 15g Yeast and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 150ml Water, 1 tsp Sugar, 15g Yeast, 225g Plain Flour, 1 1/2 tsp Salt.
1 preheat the oven to 230°c.
2 add the sugar and crumble the fresh yeast into warm water.
3 allow the mixture to stand for 10 – 15 minutes in a warm place (we find a windowsill on a sunny day works best) until froth develops on the surface.
4 sift the flour and salt into a large mixing bowl, make a well in the middle and pour in the yeast mixture and olive oil.
5 lightly flour your hands, and slowly mix the ingredients together until they bind.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Poutine
description: A delicious Canadian recipe with Dash Vegetable Oil, 1 Can Beef Gravy, 5 thin cut Potatoes and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: Dash Vegetable Oil, 1 Can Beef Gravy, 5 thin cut Potatoes, 2 cups Cheese Curds.
Heat oil in a deep fryer or deep heavy skillet to 365°f (185°c).
Place the fries into the hot oil, and cook until light brown, about 5 minutes.
Ladle gravy over the fries and cheese, and serve immediately.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Purple sprouting broccoli tempura with nuoc cham
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with 50g Corn Flour, 100g Plain Flour, 1 tablespoon Sesame Seed and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Corn Flour, 100g Plain Flour, 1 tablespoon Sesame Seed, For frying Vegetable Oil, 250ml Soda Water.
For the nuoc cham, whisk together all of the ingredients with 5 tbsp hot water in a small bowl.
Whisk the cornflour, plain flour, sesame seeds (if using) and a large pinch of salt together.
Fill a large, deep pan no more than a third full with the vegetable oil and heat until it reaches 180c or a cube of bread dropped in browns in 20 seconds.
Quickly whisk the soda water into the flour mixture, being careful not to overmix, then dunk in the broccoli using tongs.
Carefully lower into the hot oil and cook for 2-3 mins until crisp.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Shakshouka
description: A delicious Saudi Arabian recipe with 250g Tomato, 40 ml Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 4 Egg and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 250g Tomato, 40 ml Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 4 Egg, 4 sliced Garlic Clove, To taste Black Pepper.
First, pan fry the black pepper and garlic over a dry medium heat until fragrant.
Add a good amount of extra virgin olive oil and infuse for a minute.
Once the oil heats up, add the tomatoes and salt, and cover with a lid.
Make craters for the eggs and lower the heat.
Remove from the heat and let the residual heat steam the eggs for 1-2 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Shakshuka Feta Cheese
description: A delicious Saudi Arabian recipe with 4 large Egg, 3  tablespoons Tomato Sauce, 1 tablespoon Olive Oil and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 large Egg, 3  tablespoons Tomato Sauce, 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 chopped Shallots, 1 Celery.
In a pan heat the oil medium to high heat, with a tablespoon of olive oil.
Add the chopped vegetables as onions, garlic, celery and red pepper.
Stir all together for 5 mins.
Add the cumin powder and salt and pepper and the tomato sauce and let it cook for another 7 mins.
Add the eggs, cover and leave to coo for 8 mins.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Spanish meatballs with clams, chorizo & squid
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 25g Butter, 3 diced Shallots, 1 teaspoon Smoked Paprika and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 25g Butter, 3 diced Shallots, 1 teaspoon Smoked Paprika, 2 cloves minced Garlic, 1 clove finely chopped Garlic.
Add the paprika and crushed garlic and cook for 1 min until the paprika becomes fragrant.
Splash in the sherry, then pour the whole lot into a bowl with the breadcrumbs.
Add the pork mince and the egg yolk to the bowl, then beat well.
Wipe the pan, put on a medium-high heat, then add the oil.
Fry the meatballs for 5 mins, just to colour, then lift onto a plate, but keep the oil in the pan.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Syrian Bread
description: A delicious Syrian recipe with 1 and 1/8 cup Water, 2 tblsp Vegetable Oil, 1/2 teaspoon Sugar and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 and 1/8 cup Water, 2 tblsp Vegetable Oil, 1/2 teaspoon Sugar, 1 1/2 tsp Salt, 3 Cups Flour.
When the dough cycle is almost complete, preheat the oven to 475 degrees f (245 degrees c).
Cook two at a time on preheated baking sheets or a baking stone until puffed up and golden brown, about 5 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Syrian Rice with Meat
description: A delicious Syrian recipe with 1/4 cup Butter, 2 Pounds Ground Beef, 2 teaspoons Salt and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/4 cup Butter, 2 Pounds Ground Beef, 2 teaspoons Salt, 1/2 teaspoon Allspice, 1/2 teaspoon Cinnamon.
Heat 1/4 cup butter in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
Add ground beef and season with salt, allspice, cinnamon, and black pepper.
Cook and stir until beef is browned and crumbly, 7 to 10 minutes.
Stir chicken broth and rice into beef in the saucepan; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Three-cheese souffles
description: A delicious French recipe with 50g Butter, 25g Parmesan, 300ml Milk and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Butter, 25g Parmesan, 300ml Milk, 2 Bay Leaves, 5 tbs Plain Flour.
Heat oven to 200c/180c fan/ gas 6 and butter 4 small (about 200ml) ramekins.
Place the milk and bay leaves in a large saucepan over a gentle heat and bring to the boil.
Turn off the heat and leave to infuse for 15 mins.
Discard the bay leaves, add the butter and flour, and return to a low heat.
Very gently simmer, stirring continuously with a balloon whisk, for about 6 mins until you get a smooth, thick white sauce.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Turkey Bánh mì
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with 2 small Baguette, 50g Chicken Liver, 1/4 Cucumber and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 small Baguette, 50g Chicken Liver, 1/4 Cucumber, 140g Turkey, 1 tablespoon Mayonnaise.
In a small bowl, combine the ginger, rice vinegar, sugar and a few pinches of salt.
Pour over the vegetables and toss together.
Mix the mayonnaise with the chopped chilli and dollop over the top.
Scatter over the mint leaves and sliced chilli.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chilli prawn linguine
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 280g Linguine Pasta, 200g Sugar Snap Peas, 2 tblsp Olive Oil and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
