instructions: Gather all ingredients: 280g Linguine Pasta, 200g Sugar Snap Peas, 2 tblsp Olive Oil, 2 cloves chopped Garlic Clove, 1 large Red Chilli.
Mix the dressing ingredients in a small bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Cook the pasta according to the packet instructions.
Add the sugar snap peas for the last minute or so of cooking time.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan, toss in the garlic and chilli and cook over a fairly gentle heat for about 30 seconds without letting the garlic brown.
Tip in the prawns and cook over a high heat, stirring frequently, for about 3 minutes until they turn pink.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 1 lb Fettuccine, 1/2 cup Heavy Cream, 1/2 cup Butter and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Fettuccine, 1/2 cup Heavy Cream, 1/2 cup Butter, 1/2 cup Parmesan, 2 tbsp Parsley.
Cook pasta according to package instructions in a large pot of boiling water and salt.
Add heavy cream and butter to a large skillet over medium heat until the cream bubbles and the butter melts.
Whisk in parmesan and add seasoning (salt and black pepper).
Let the sauce thicken slightly and then add the pasta and toss until coated in sauce.
Garnish with parsley, and it's ready.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fettucine alfredo
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 227g Clotted Cream, 25g Butter, 1 tsp Corn Flour and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 227g Clotted Cream, 25g Butter, 1 tsp Corn Flour, 100g Parmesan Cheese, Grated Nutmeg.
In a medium saucepan, stir the clotted cream, butter and cornflour over a low-ish heat and bring to a low simmer.
Turn off the heat and keep warm.
Meanwhile, put the cheese and nutmeg in a small bowl and add a good grinding of black pepper, then stir everything together (don’t add any salt at this stage).
Put the pasta in another pan with 2 tsp salt, pour over some boiling water and cook following pack instructions (usually 3-4 mins).
When cooked, scoop some of the cooking water into a heatproof jug or mug and drain the pasta, but not too thoroughly.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Grilled Mac and Cheese Sandwich
description: A delicious American recipe with 8 ounces (230 grams) Macaroni, 1/3 cup Plain Flour, 3/4 teaspoon Mustard Powder and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 8 ounces (230 grams) Macaroni, 1/3 cup Plain Flour, 3/4 teaspoon Mustard Powder, 1/2 teaspoon Garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon Kosher salt.
Bring a medium saucepan of generously salted water (you want it to taste like seawater) to a boil.
Add the pasta and cook, stirring occasionally, until al dente, 8 to 10 minutes, or according to the package directions.
While the pasta is cooking, in a small bowl, whisk together the flour, mustard powder, garlic powder, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper.
Place the empty pasta pan (no need to wash it) over low heat and add the butter.
When the butter has melted, whisk in the flour mixture and continue to cook, whisking frequently, until the mixture is beginning to brown and has a pleasant, nutty aroma, about 1 minute.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lasagna Sandwiches
description: A delicious American recipe with 1/4 cup Sour Cream, 2 tbs Chopped Onion, 1/2 tbs Dried Oregano and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/4 cup Sour Cream, 2 tbs Chopped Onion, 1/2 tbs Dried Oregano, 1/4 tsp Salt, 8 slices Bread.
In a small bowl, combine the first four ingredients; spread on four slices of bread.
Toast sandwiches until lightly browned on both sides and cheese is melted, adding butter if necessary.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Lasagne
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 1 tblsp Olive Oil, 2 Bacon, 1 finely chopped Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tblsp Olive Oil, 2 Bacon, 1 finely chopped Onion, 1 Stick Celery, 1 medium Carrots.
Heat the oil in a large saucepan.
Use kitchen scissors to snip the bacon into small pieces, or use a sharp knife to chop it on a chopping board.
Add the bacon to the pan and cook for just a few mins until starting to turn golden.
Add the onion, celery and carrot, and cook over a medium heat for 5 mins, stirring occasionally, until softened.
Add the garlic and cook for 1 min, then tip in the mince and cook, stirring and breaking it up with a wooden spoon, for about 6 mins until browned all over.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Pilchard puttanesca
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 300g Spaghetti, 1 tbls Olive Oil, 1 finely chopped Onion and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 300g Spaghetti, 1 tbls Olive Oil, 1 finely chopped Onion, 2 cloves minced Garlic, 1 Red Chilli.
Cook the pasta following pack instructions.
Heat the oil in a non-stick frying pan and cook the onion, garlic and chilli for 3-4 mins to soften.
Stir in the tomato purée and cook for 1 min, then add the pilchards with their sauce.
Cook, breaking up the fish with a wooden spoon, then add the olives and continue to cook for a few more mins.
Drain the pasta and add to the pan with 2-3 tbsp of the cooking water.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Spaghetti alla Carbonara
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 320g Spaghetti, 6 Egg Yolks, As required Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 320g Spaghetti, 6 Egg Yolks, As required Salt, 150g Bacon, 50g Pecorino.
Put a large saucepan of water on to boil.
Finely chop the 100g pancetta, having first removed any rind.
Finely grate 50g pecorino cheese and 50g parmesan and mix them together.
Beat the 3 large eggs in a medium bowl and season with a little freshly grated black pepper.
Add 1 tsp salt to the boiling water, add 350g spaghetti and when the water comes back to the boil, cook at a constant simmer, covered, for 10 minutes or until al dente (just cooked).
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Syrian Spaghetti
description: A delicious Syrian recipe with 16 ounces Spaghetti, 8 ounces Tomato Sauce, 6 oz Tomato Puree and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 16 ounces Spaghetti, 8 ounces Tomato Sauce, 6 oz Tomato Puree, 1 teaspoon Cinnamon, 1/4 cup Vegetable Oil.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees f (175 degrees c).
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
Add spaghetti and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain and stir in tomato sauce, tomato paste, cinnamon, oil, salt and pepper.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, or until top is crunchy.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Venetian Duck Ragu
description: A delicious Italian recipe with 1 tbls Olive Oil, 4 Duck Legs, 2 finely chopped Onions and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tbls Olive Oil, 4 Duck Legs, 2 finely chopped Onions, 2 cloves minced Garlic, 2 tsp ground Cinnamon.
Heat the oil in a large pan.
Add the duck legs and brown on all sides for about 10 mins.
Add the onions to the pan and cook for 5 mins until softened.
Add the garlic and cook for a further 1 min, then stir in the cinnamon and flour and cook for a further min.
Return the duck to the pan, add the wine, tomatoes, stock, herbs, sugar and seasoning.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bubble & Squeak
description: A delicious British recipe with 1 tbs Butter, 4 Bacon, 1 finely sliced Onion and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tbs Butter, 4 Bacon, 1 finely sliced Onion, 1 chopped Garlic Clove, 20 Brussels Sprouts.
Melt the fat in a non-stick pan, allow it to get nice and hot, then add the bacon.
As it begins to brown, add the onion and garlic.
Next, add the sliced sprouts or cabbage and let it colour slightly.

Work everything together in the pan and push it down so that the mixture covers the base of the pan – allow the mixture to catch slightly on the base of the pan before turning it over and doing the same again.
It’s the bits of potato that catch in the pan that define the term ‘bubble and squeak’, so be brave and let the mixture colour.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Arroz al horno (baked rice)
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 2 tbsp Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 800g Pork belly slices, 150g Black Pudding and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tbsp Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 800g Pork belly slices, 150g Black Pudding, 100g Bacon lardon, 1 chopped Onion.
Heat oven to 200c/180c/gas 6.
Heat half the oil in a deep frying or sauté pan (or shallow casserole dish) measuring around 30cm in diameter.
Over a high heat, colour the pork belly slices on each side in several batches, then transfer to a bowl.
Add the remaining oil to the pan and lower the heat to medium, then add the black pudding and bacon and fry all over for several mins.
Fry the onion and peppers for around 10 mins until soft and pale gold, then add the tomato and cook until soft.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Barbecue pork buns
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with 85g Sugar, 500g White Bread Mix, 1 tablespoon Sunflower Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 85g Sugar, 500g White Bread Mix, 1 tablespoon Sunflower Oil, 12 Bacon, Knob Ginger.
Heat the oven to 200c/fan 180c/gas.
Mix the sugar into the bread mix in a large bowl, then add water as instructed on the pack.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a pan, then fry the bacon until crisp, about 5 mins.
Add the ginger and garlic and fry for 1 min until soft, then tip in the soy, honey and tomato purée and stir well.
Brush with egg and bake for 20 mins until golden.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: BBQ Pork Sloppy Joes
description: A delicious American recipe with 2 Potatoes, 1 Red Onions, 2 cloves Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Potatoes, 1 Red Onions, 2 cloves Garlic, 1 Lime, 2 Bread.
Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Slice as thinly as possible until you have ¼ cup (½ cup for 4 servings); finely chop remaining onion.
Peel and finely chop garlic.
Add 1 tbsp butter (2 tbsp for 4) to a separate small microwave-safe bowl; microwave until melted, 30 seconds.
To bowl with lime juice, add sliced onion, ¼ tsp sugar (½ tsp for 4 servings), and a pinch of salt.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bigos (Hunters Stew)
description: A delicious Polish recipe with 2 sliced Bacon, 1 lb Kielbasa, 1 lb Pork and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 sliced Bacon, 1 lb Kielbasa, 1 lb Pork, 1/4 cup Flour, 3 chopped Garlic.
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f (175 degrees c).
Heat a large pot over medium heat.
Add the bacon and kielbasa; cook and stir until the bacon has rendered its fat and sausage is lightly browned.
Coat the cubes of pork lightly with flour and fry them in the bacon drippings over medium-high heat until golden brown.
Add the garlic, onion, carrots, fresh mushrooms, cabbage and sauerkraut.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Boxty Breakfast
description: A delicious Irish recipe with 4 large Potatoes, 1  bunch Spring Onions, 100g Plain Flour and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 large Potatoes, 1  bunch Spring Onions, 100g Plain Flour, 1 Egg White, 150ml Milk.
Cut the other 2 into large chunks, then boil for 10-15 mins or until tender.
Mash the boiled potatoes, then mix with the grated potato, spring onions and flour.
Whisk the egg white in a large bowl until it holds soft peaks.
Fold in the buttermilk, then add the bicarbonate of soda.
Fold into the potato mix.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bryndzové Halušky
description: A delicious Slovakian recipe with 500g Potatoes, 200g Plain Flour, 1 Egg and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Potatoes, 200g Plain Flour, 1 Egg, 1 teaspoon Salt, 250g Bryndza cheese.
Place the grated potatoes in a bowl and mix them with flour, egg, and salt until a sticky dough forms.
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Using a halušky maker (similar to a spaetzle maker), press the dough directly into the boiling water.
Let the dumplings cook until they float to the surface, usually within 2-3 minutes.
Chop the bacon into small pieces and fry in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Cassava pizza
description: A delicious Venezulan recipe with 6 cut thick slices Casabe, 450g Tomato Sauce, 225g Chorizo and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 6 cut thick slices Casabe, 450g Tomato Sauce, 225g Chorizo, 225g Turkey Ham, 75g Sweetcorn.
Preheat the oven to 200ºc.
Add the bacon or chorizo, corn, turkey ham, some olives and paprika.
Bake for 7 to 10 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chickpea, chorizo & spinach stew
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 4 tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 1 Diced Carrots and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 1 Diced Carrots, 1 Diced Celery, 3 Thyme.
Heat the oil in a large pan, then gently fry the onion for 3-4 mins until it begins to soften.
Stir in the carrot, celery, thyme and bay leaves.
Season, then cook for 2-3 mins, stirring occasionally.
Add the garlic, chorizo, cinnamon and smoked paprika.
Gently fry until the vegetables soften and the chorizo starts to release its oils and crisp up.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Choripán
description: A delicious Argentinian recipe with 4 Chorizo, 4 Crusty Bread, Drizzle Chimichurri sauce and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 Chorizo, 4 Crusty Bread, Drizzle Chimichurri sauce.
Grill the chorizos: cook the chorizos on a grill or pan until fully cooked, about 10-15 minutes.
Prepare the rolls: slice the rolls and toast them lightly on the grill or in a pan.
Assemble: slice each chorizo lengthwise and place in a roll.
Serve: enjoy immediately while hot.
Grill the chorizo slowly on medium heat to prevent the skin from bursting and to ensure it cooks evenly throughout.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chorizo & chickpea soup
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 400g Tinned Tomatos, 110g Chorizo, 140g Savoy Cabbage and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 400g Tinned Tomatos, 110g Chorizo, 140g Savoy Cabbage, Sprinkling Chilli Flakes, 400g can Chickpeas.
Put a medium pan on the heat and tip in the tomatoes, followed by a can of water.
While the tomatoes are heating, quickly chop the chorizo into chunky pieces (removing any skin) and shred the cabbage.
Stir well, cover and leave to bubble over a high heat for 6 mins or until the cabbage is just tender.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chorizo & soft-boiled egg salad
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 500g Baby New Potatoes, 4 Egg, 225g Green Beans and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Baby New Potatoes, 4 Egg, 225g Green Beans, 225g Chorizo, 1 sliced Garlic Clove.
Cook the potatoes in a large pan of boiling salted water for 12 mins, adding the eggs after 6 mins, and the beans for the final 2 mins.
Meanwhile fry chorizo slices for 1-2 mins, until beginning to crisp.
Add the garlic to the pan and cook gently for 1 min.
Remove the pan from the heat, stir in the vinegar and parsley, then toss with the potatoes, beans, chorizo and seasoning.
Shell the eggs, cut into quarters and add to the salad.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chorizo & tomato salad
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 3 Beef tomatoes, 1/2 Red Onions, Sprigs of fresh Thyme and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Beef tomatoes, 1/2 Red Onions, Sprigs of fresh Thyme, 1 tablespoon Sherry vinegar, 2 tblsp Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
Season, then drizzle with the vinegar and oil.
Let the flavours mingle while you cook the chorizo.
In a hot, dry pan, fry the chorizo slices until browned on both sides.
Serve the tomatoes with the fried chorizo, drizzled with a little oil from the pan.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chorizo, potato & cheese omelette
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 1 small Potatoes, 1 teaspoon Olive Oil, 50g Chorizo and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 small Potatoes, 1 teaspoon Olive Oil, 50g Chorizo, 3 Egg, Chopped Parsley.
Cook the potato in boiling water for 8-10 mins or until tender.
Heat oil in an omelette pan, add chorizo and cook for 2 mins.
Add the potato and cook for a further 5 mins until the potato starts to crisp.
Spoon pan contents out, wipe pan and cook a 2 or 3-egg omelette in the same pan.
When almost cooked, scatter with the chorizo and potato, parsley and cheese.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Coddled pork with cider
description: A delicious Irish recipe with Knob Butter, 2 Pork Chops, 4 Bacon and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: Knob Butter, 2 Pork Chops, 4 Bacon, 2 Potatoes, 1 Carrots.
Heat the butter in a casserole dish until sizzling, then fry the pork for 2-3 mins on each side until browned.
Tip the bacon, carrot, potatoes and swede into the pan, then gently fry until slightly coloured.
Stir in the cabbage, sit the chops back on top, add the bay leaf, then pour over the cider and stock.
Cover the pan, then leave everything to gently simmer for 20 mins until the pork is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.
Serve at the table spooned straight from the dish.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Crispy Sausages and Greens
description: A delicious Irish recipe with 1  bunch Kale, 8 Italian Fennel Sausages, 1 Head chopped Cabbage and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1  bunch Kale, 8 Italian Fennel Sausages, 1 Head chopped Cabbage, 8 Garlic Clove, Sliced Onion.
Preheat the oven to 350°.
Coarsely chop half a head of green cabbage.
Combine the greens in a large baking dish and add 4 cloves of thinly sliced garlic.

Adding some sliced onions and shiitake mushrooms at this point is optional, but highly recommended (i'll sauté the onions and mushrooms in a cast iron baking dish right on the stove before adding to the greens).
Coat the greens with some olive oil and pour ½ cup chicken stock or broth over everything.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fašírky
description: A delicious Slovakian recipe with 500g Ground Pork, 1 medium chopped Onion, 2 cloves minced Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Ground Pork, 1 medium chopped Onion, 2 cloves minced Garlic, 2 sliced Bread, 1 shot Milk.
Prepare the bread mixture.
Soak the bread slices in milk or water until soft.
In a large bowl, combine ground meat, chopped onions, garlic, soaked bread, egg, and seasonings.
Mix well until evenly combined.
Take portions of the mixture and shape them into palm-sized patties.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Ham croquetas
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 75g Plain Flour, 2 large Egg, 75g Breadcrumbs and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 75g Plain Flour, 2 large Egg, 75g Breadcrumbs, For frying Sunflower Oil, 4 tbsp Extra Virgin Olive Oil.
To make the filling, heat the olive oil in a pan until it starts to shimmer.
Add the leek and sauté until soft but not coloured.
Stir in the ham with a wooden spoon, fry for 1 min, then stir in the flour and fry over a medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the mixture is golden but not burnt – this will take about 5 mins.
Meanwhile, combine the stock and milk in a small pan and heat until steaming but not boiling.
Season with a few scrapes of nutmeg.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Ham hock colcannon
description: A delicious Irish recipe with 800g Floury Potatoes, 50g Butter, 3 chopped Garlic Clove and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 800g Floury Potatoes, 50g Butter, 3 chopped Garlic Clove, 1 chopped Cabbage, 8 Spring Onions.
Put in a large pan filled with cold salted water, bring to the boil and cook for 10-15 mins until a knife can be inserted into the potatoes easily.
Meanwhile, melt the butter in a large sauté pan over a medium heat.
Add the garlic, cabbage, spring onions and some seasoning.
Stir occasionally until the cabbage is wilted but still retains a little bite, then set aside.
Drain the potatoes, leave to steam-dry for a couple of mins, then mash with the cream, mustard and seasoning in the same saucepan.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Hot and Sour Soup
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1/3 cup Mushrooms, 1/3 cup Wood Ear Mushrooms, 2/3 Cup Tofu and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/3 cup Mushrooms, 1/3 cup Wood Ear Mushrooms, 2/3 Cup Tofu, 1/2 cup Pork, 2-1/2 cups Chicken Stock.
In a wok add chicken broth and wait for it to boil.
Next add salt, sugar, sesame seed oil, white pepper, hot pepper sauce, vinegar and soy sauce and stir for few seconds.
Add tofu, mushrooms, black wood ear mushrooms to the wok.
To thicken the sauce, whisk together 1 tablespoon of cornstarch and 2 tablespoon of water in a bowl and slowly add to your soup until it's the right thickness.
Next add 1 egg slightly beaten with a knife or fork and add it to the soup and stir for 8 seconds.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Arroz con gambas y calamar
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 24 Raw King Prawns, 2 tbsp Olive Oil, 1 small Onion and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 24 Raw King Prawns, 2 tbsp Olive Oil, 1 small Onion, 1 Bay Leaf, 1 pinch Saffron.
Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan or shallow flameproof casserole over a medium-low heat and fry the onion for 5 mins until softened.
Add the bay leaf, saffron, rice and tomato purée, and cook for 1-2 mins more, stirring.
Pour in the wine and bubble for 1-2 mins, then pour in the seafood stock and 150ml water.
Cook for 5 mins, then add the squid, season well and stir to combine.
Bring to the boil, then cover and reduce the heat to a gentle simmer.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Baked salmon with fennel & tomatoes
description: A delicious British recipe with 2 medium Fennel, 2 tbs chopped Parsley, Juice of 1 Lemon and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 medium Fennel, 2 tbs chopped Parsley, Juice of 1 Lemon, 175g Cherry Tomatoes, 1 tbs Olive Oil.
Heat oven to 180c/fan 160c/gas 4.
Cook in boiling salted water for 10 mins, then drain well.
Chop the fennel fronds roughly, then mix with the parsley and lemon zest.
Spread the drained fennel over a shallow ovenproof dish, then add the tomatoes.
Drizzle with olive oil, then bake for 10 mins.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bang bang prawn salad
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with 140g Rice Noodles, 3 tablespoons Peanut Butter, 4 tablespoons Coconut Milk and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 140g Rice Noodles, 3 tablespoons Peanut Butter, 4 tablespoons Coconut Milk, 3  tablespoons sweet chilli sauce, 3 sliced thinly Spring Onions.
Cook the noodles following pack instructions, then rinse under cold water and drain thoroughly.
In a small saucepan melt together the peanut butter, coconut milk, sweet chilli sauce and half the spring onions, adding 1-2 tbsp of water to loosen the mixture to a drizzling consistency.
Mix the noodles, cucumber and beansprouts in a serving dish.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Barramundi with Moroccan spices
description: A delicious Australian recipe with 2 x 400g barramundi, 1/2 teaspoon Ground Cumin, 1/2 tsp Coriander and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 x 400g barramundi, 1/2 teaspoon Ground Cumin, 1/2 tsp Coriander, Pinch Paprika, Pinch Chili Powder.
Heat oven to 220c/fan 200c/gas 7.
Place the fish on a roasting tray, then cook in the oven for 20 mins until the flesh is firm and the eyes have turned white.
Serve the fish with the rest of the dressing and steamed couscous or rice.
Know how: how to cook it: cooking barramundi on the bone, as we have done here, has its advantages – it will stay more moist during cooking, and some would say that the flavour is enhanced, too.
If you want to take out the bones they are easy to locate and less likely to be lodged in the fillet if the fish is cooked whole.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Cajun spiced fish tacos
description: A delicious Mexican recipe with 2 tbsp cajun, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, 4 fillets white fish and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tbsp cajun, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, 4 fillets white fish, 1 tsp vegetable oil, 8 flour tortilla.
Cooking in a cajun spice and cayenne pepper marinade makes this fish super succulent and flavoursome.
Top with a zesty dressing and serve in a tortilla for a quick, fuss-free main that's delightfully summery.
On a large plate, mix the cajun spice and cayenne pepper with a little seasoning and use to coat the fish all over.
Heat a little oil in a frying pan, add in the fish and cook over a medium heat until golden.
Reduce the heat and continue frying until the fish is cooked through, about 10 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Clam, chorizo & white bean stew
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 50g Chorizo, 1 chopped Onion, 1 Garlic Clove and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Chorizo, 1 chopped Onion, 1 Garlic Clove, Bunch Parsley, 200ml Vegetable Stock.
Fry the chorizo in a large frying pan with a lid, over a medium heat until it is starting to crisp up and release its oil.
Add the onion and cook for 5 mins until starting to soften.
Then add the garlic and finely chopped parsley, and fry for 1 min more.
Pour on the stock and tomatoes.
Bring to the boil, reduce the heat, then add the beans and sherry vinegar.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Egg Foo Young
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1 cup Unsalted Beef Stock, 1 tablespoon Soy Sauce, 1 tablespoon Shaoxing Wine and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 cup Unsalted Beef Stock, 1 tablespoon Soy Sauce, 1 tablespoon Shaoxing Wine, 1 tablespoon Oyster Sauce, 1/2 tsp Pepper.
In a small saucepan, add the beef stock, soy sauce, shaoxing wine, oyster sauce, and white pepper powder over medium heat.
Whisk together and bring to a simmer.
Combine the cornstarch and water in a small bowl and whisk to dissolve.
Add to the saucepan and whisk until the gravy thickens and coats the back of the spoon, 2 to 3 minutes.
Cover the saucepan with a lid and keep it warm on the lowest possible heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Escovitch Fish
description: A delicious Jamaican recipe with 2 Pounds Red Snapper, 1/2 cup Vegetable Oil, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Pounds Red Snapper, 1/2 cup Vegetable Oil, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic, 1/2 tsp Ginger, 2 sprigs Thyme.
Rinse fish; rub with lemon or lime, seasoned with salt and pepper or use your favorite seasoning.
I used creole seasoning.
In large skillet heat oil over medium heat, until hot, add the fish, cook each side- for about 5-7 minutes until cooked through and crispy on both sides.
Add, bay leave, garlic and ginger, stir-fry for about a minute making sure the garlic does not burn.
Then add onion, bell peppers, thyme, scotch bonnet, sugar, all spice-continue stirring for about 2-3 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fish fofos
description: A delicious Portuguese recipe with 600g Haddock, 300g Potatoes, 1 chopped Green Chilli and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 600g Haddock, 300g Potatoes, 1 chopped Green Chilli, 3 tbs Coriander, 1 tsp Cumin Seeds.
Put the fish into a lidded pan and pour over enough water to cover.
Bring to a simmer and gently poach for 10 minutes over a low heat with the lid on.
Season, add the rice flour, mix well and break in 1 egg.
Stir the mixture and divide into 15, then form into small logs.
Break the remaining eggs into a bowl and whisk lightly.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fish pie
description: A delicious British recipe with 900g Floury Potatoes, 2 tbsp Olive Oil, 600ml Semi-skimmed Milk and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 900g Floury Potatoes, 2 tbsp Olive Oil, 600ml Semi-skimmed Milk, 800g White Fish Fillets, 1 tbsp Plain flour.
Put the potatoes in a large pan of cold salted water and bring to the boil.
Lower the heat, cover, then simmer gently for 15 minutes until tender.
Drain, then return to the pan over a low heat for 30 seconds to drive off any excess water.
Mash with 1 tbsp olive oil, then season.
Meanwhile put the milk in a large sauté pan, add the fish and bring to the boil.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fish Soup (Ukha)
description: A delicious Russian recipe with 2 tbs Olive Oil, 1 sliced Onion, 2 medium Carrots and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tbs Olive Oil, 1 sliced Onion, 2 medium Carrots, 3 cups Fish Stock, 3 cups Water.
In a medium pot, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat.
Add the onions and cook, stirring occasionally until the onions start to caramelize.
Add the carrots and cook until the carrots start to soften, about 4 more minutes.
Add the stock, water, potatoes, bay leaves, and black peppercorns.
Season with salt and bring to a boil.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fish Stew with Rouille
description: A delicious French recipe with 6 large Prawns, 3 tbs Olive Oil, 150ml Dry White Wine and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 6 large Prawns, 3 tbs Olive Oil, 150ml Dry White Wine, 200ml Fish Stock, 1 small finely diced Fennel.
Fry the shells in 1 tbsp oil for 5 mins, until dark pink and golden in patches.
Add the wine, boil down by two thirds, then pour in the stock.
Heat the rest of the oil in a deep frying pan or casserole.
Add the fennel, onion and garlic, season, then cover and gently cook for 10 mins until softened.
Put into a pan of cold water, bring to the boil and cook for 5 mins until almost tender.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fiskesuppe (Creamy Norwegian Fish Soup)
description: A delicious Norwegian recipe with 1 lb Fish fillet, 1 clove Garlic, 2 medium Potatoes and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Fish fillet, 1 clove Garlic, 2 medium Potatoes, 2 Carrots, 1 Leek.
Crush or chop the garlic.
Heat the butter in a pot and add the garlic.
Once the garlic starts to turn golden add the flour, whisking well.
Add the fish stock and continue to whisk until there are no lumps.
Add the vegetables and milk and bring to a boil.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fried calamari
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 300g Squid, 200g Plain Flour, 2 tblsp Capers and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 300g Squid, 200g Plain Flour, 2 tblsp Capers, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic, 5 tblsp Mayonnaise.
Tip the flour into a freezer bag and season well.
Add the capers, then give everything a good shake to mix together.
Mix together the garlic and mayonnaise, then place in a serving bowl.
Pour some oil into a large pan until it comes about 7cm up the sides, but the pan is no more than a third full.
Place over a medium heat and let the oil warm up.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Gambas al ajillo
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 12 Raw King Prawns, 3 Garlic Clove, 100 ml Olive Oil and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 12 Raw King Prawns, 3 Garlic Clove, 100 ml Olive Oil, 3 Cayenne Pepper, 1 tablespoon chopped Parsley.
Or, if you are using a frying pan rather than a terracotta pot, you can cook the prawns in their shells.
Season with a little sea salt.
Put the garlic, olive oil and chillies in a flameproof terracotta pot or frying pan and set over a high heat.
When the garlic starts to turn golden, add the prawns and cook for 1-2 mins on each side until just pink.
Sprinkle over the chopped parsley and some freshly cracked black pepper, and serve immediately.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Garlicky prawns with sherry
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 3  tablespoons Olive Oil, 3 cloves Chopped Garlic, 400g Prawns and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3  tablespoons Olive Oil, 3 cloves Chopped Garlic, 400g Prawns, 2 tbsp Dry sherry, Handful Parsley.
Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan.
Tip in the garlic slices and cook for a few secs.
Then stir through the prawns and cook for a couple of mins until they start to turn pink.
Pour over the sherry and cook for a few mins more, just until the prawns are cooked through.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Grilled Portuguese sardines
description: A delicious Portuguese recipe with 8 Sardines, 2 tbs Olive Oil, 3 cloves Garlic and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 8 Sardines, 2 tbs Olive Oil, 3 cloves Garlic, 1 tbs Paprika, 1/2 Lemon.
Put all of the ingredients, except the sardines, into a bowl and mix together with some seasoning.
Pour into a baking dish, add the sardines and toss really well.
Heat a bbq or griddle pan until hot.
Cook the sardines for 4-5 minutes on each side or until really caramelised and charred.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Jamaican Curry Shrimp Recipe
description: A delicious Jamaican recipe with 1 lb Jumbo Shrimp, 2.5 tbsp Jamaican Curry Powder, 1 tsp All-purpose Seasoning and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Jumbo Shrimp, 2.5 tbsp Jamaican Curry Powder, 1 tsp All-purpose Seasoning, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 sliced Onion.
Season shrimp with 1 tablespoon of curry powder and all-purpose seasoning and set aside for about 10 minutes while you prepare the other ingredients like chopping your onions, peppers, and garlic.
Heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add sliced yellow onion, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, scotch bonnet pepper, if using, and chopped garlic and stir for 5 minutes, until peppers are slightly softened.
5 tablespoons of curry powder to the skillet and stir for an additional minute.
Then add coconut milk, seasoned shrimp, ketchup, and thyme, making sure the shrimp is covered in the sauce.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Air Fryer Egg Rolls
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 lb Ground Pork, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 lb Ground Pork, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic, 1 tablespoon Ginger, 1 medium Carrots.
Alternative pan fry method: if you don’t have access to an air fryer, you can make these egg rolls using a traditional pan fry method.
Add enough oil to a medium skillet with high walls so the oil is about 1/2 inch up the side of the skillet.
Heat oil on medium high heat until it reaches 350°f.
Add egg rolls and fry for 3 to 4 minutes, flip, and fry for another 3 to 4 minutes until golden brown.
In a large skillet over medium heat, add the olive oil along with the ground pork or chicken.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Algerian Bouzgene Berber Bread with Roasted Pepper Sauce
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 2 Red Pepper, 4 Tomato, 1 tablespoon Olive Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Red Pepper, 4 Tomato, 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 4 Cloves Chopped Garlic, 1 chopped Jalapeno.
Preheat your oven's broiler.
Heat 1 tablespoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add the jalapenos and garlic, and cook until tender, stirring frequently.
Remove from heat, and transfer the garlic and jalapeno to the bowl with the tomatoes and red peppers.
Stir, and set sauce aside.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Algerian Carrots
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 1 1/2 cup Water, 2 Lbs Carrots, 5 tablespoons Olive Oil and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 1/2 cup Water, 2 Lbs Carrots, 5 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 tsp Salt, 1/2 teaspoon Black Pepper.
Cover, and bring the water to a boil over high heat.
Add the sliced carrots, reduce the heat to medium, and cover the pan again.
Steam until tender but not mushy, 4 to 6 minutes depending on the thickness of the slices.
Reserve 1/2 cup of the cooking liquid.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Baba Ghanoush
description: A delicious Syrian recipe with 4 large Egg Plants, 2 cloves Garlic, 2 teaspoons Kosher Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 large Egg Plants, 2 cloves Garlic, 2 teaspoons Kosher Salt, 1 Lemon, 3  tablespoons Tahini.
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Cook until eggplants have collapsed and are very soft, 25 to 30 minutes.
Transfer eggplant to mixing bowl.
Add crushed garlic and salt; mash until creamy but with a little texture, about 5 minutes.
Whisk in lemon juice, tahini, olive oil, and cayenne pepper.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Blini Pancakes
description: A delicious Russian recipe with 1/2 cup Buckwheat, 2/3 Cup Flour, 1/2 tsp Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/2 cup Buckwheat, 2/3 Cup Flour, 1/2 tsp Salt, 1 tsp Yeast, 1 cup Milk.
In a large bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup buckwheat flour, 2/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1 teaspoon yeast.
Make a well in the center and pour in 1 cup warm milk, whisking until the batter is smooth.
Stir 2 tablespoons melted butter and 1 egg yolk into the batter.
In a separate bowl, whisk 1 egg white until stiff, but not dry.
Fold the whisked egg white into the batter.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Boulangère Potatoes
description: A delicious French recipe with 2 finely chopped Onions, sprigs of fresh Thyme, 2 tbs Olive Oil and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 finely chopped Onions, sprigs of fresh Thyme, 2 tbs Olive Oil, 1.5kg Potatoes, 425g Vegetable Stock.
Heat oven to 200c/fan 180c/gas 6.
Fry the onions and thyme sprigs in the oil until softened and lightly coloured (about 5 mins).
Pour over the stock and bake for 50-60 mins until the potatoes are cooked and the top is golden and crisp.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Brie wrapped in prosciutto & brioche
description: A delicious French recipe with 375g Plain Flour, 50g Caster Sugar, 7g Yeast and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 375g Plain Flour, 50g Caster Sugar, 7g Yeast, 75g Milk, 3 Large Eggs.
Mix the flour, 1 tsp salt, caster sugar, yeast, milk and eggs together in a mixer using the dough attachment for 5 mins until the dough is smooth.
Add the butter and mix for a further 4 mins on medium speed.
Scrape the dough bowl and mix again for 1 min.
Heat oven to 200c/180c fan/gas 6, then bake for 22 mins.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Burek
description: A delicious Croatian recipe with 1 Packet Filo Pastry, 150g Minced Beef, 150g Onion and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 Packet Filo Pastry, 150g Minced Beef, 150g Onion, 40g Oil, Dash Salt.
Fry the finely chopped onions and minced meat in oil.
Add the salt and pepper.
When you have five or six layers, cover with filo pastry, bake at 200ºc/392ºf for half an hour and cut in quarters and serve.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Cacik
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 500g Natural Yoghurt, 2 tsp Lemon Juice, 1 tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Natural Yoghurt, 2 tsp Lemon Juice, 1 tablespoon Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 1 tablespoon Dried Mint, 1 Cucumber.
Add the lemon juice, most of the olive oil and the dried mint to a bowl and stir well for the dried mint to soften and soak up the juices.
Mix in the strained yogurt, then pour away the strained yogurt liquid and leave that bowl to one side.
Add the strained, grated cucumber, garlic and ¾ tsp flaky salt to the rest of the ingredients and mix well.
Garnish with a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil and a sprinkling of dried mint.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Callaloo and SaltFish
description: A delicious Jamaican recipe with 1/2 lb Salt Cod, 4 Bacon, 525g Callaloo and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1/2 lb Salt Cod, 4 Bacon, 525g Callaloo, 1 chopped Onion, 2 chopped Spring Onions.
Next, heat salted fish in water on stove until water boils.
Remove from heat and drain.
Cook bacon in skillet over medium heat until crispy.
Remove bacon from heat and drain the majority of the bacon grease, leaving about 1 tablespoon in the skillet.
Add yellow onion, green onion, scotch bonnet pepper, and garlic to the skillet and stir.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Challah
description: A delicious Polish recipe with 500g Strong white bread flour, 70g Caster Sugar, 10g Yeast and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Strong white bread flour, 70g Caster Sugar, 10g Yeast, 2 Beaten Egg, 70 ml Sunflower Oil.
Combine the yeast, a pinch of the sugar and a couple tablespoons of lukewarm water in a small bowl.
Stir to dissolve the yeast, then leave for 10 mins until foamy.
Meanwhile, combine the flour, the remaining sugar and 2 tsp fine salt in a large bowl.
Make a well in the centre, then add half the beaten egg, the yeast mixture and the oil.
Pour in 200ml lukewarm water (it should feel slightly warm to the touch) and stir with a spoon, then mix using one hand, keeping the other clean while you bring the dough together.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Cheese Borek
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 1 beaten Egg, 1  bunch Parsley, 2 cloves minced Garlic and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 beaten Egg, 1  bunch Parsley, 2 cloves minced Garlic, 3/4 teaspoon Red Pepper, 6 oz Gouda Cheese.
In a medium bowl, whisk together egg, parsley, garlic and crushed red pepper.
Mix in gouda and emmentaler.
Place a rounded teaspoon of the egg mixture at one end of each strip.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees f (175 degrees c).
Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until lightly browned.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Corba
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 1 cup Lentils, 1 large Onion, 1 large Carrots and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 cup Lentils, 1 large Onion, 1 large Carrots, 1 tbs Tomato Puree, 2 tsp Cumin.
In a large pot over medium-high heat, sauté the olive oil and the onion with a pinch of salt for about 3 minutes, then add the carrots and cook for another 3 minutes.
Add the tomato paste and stir it around for around 1 minute.
Now add the cumin, paprika, mint, thyme, black pepper, and red pepper as quickly as you can and stir for 10 seconds to bloom the spices.
Immediately add the lentils, water, broth, and salt.
Bring the soup to a (gentle) boil.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fainá
description: A delicious Argentinian recipe with 200g Chickpea Flour, 600ml Water, 4 tablespoons Olive Oil and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 200g Chickpea Flour, 600ml Water, 4 tablespoons Olive Oil, To taste Salt, To taste Pepper.
Prepare the batter: whisk together chickpea flour, water, salt, and pepper.
Bake: preheat the oven to 220°c (430°f).
Pour olive oil into a round baking dish and heat in the oven.
Pour in the batter and bake for 25-30 minutes, until golden.
Serve: slice and serve hot, optionally with black pepper on top.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fennel Dauphinoise
description: A delicious French recipe with 225g Potatoes, 1 small Fennel, 1 clove finely chopped Garlic and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 225g Potatoes, 1 small Fennel, 1 clove finely chopped Garlic, 75 ml Milk, 100ml Double Cream.
Heat oven to 180c/160c fan/gas 4.
Pour in milk and double cream, season well and simmer gently, covered, for 10 mins, stirring halfway through, until potatoes are just tender.
Divide the mixture between 2 small (about 150ml) buttered ramekins and scatter with parmesan.
Bake for 40 mins until the potatoes are golden and tender when pierced with a knife.
Snip the reserved fennel fronds over before serving.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Feteer Meshaltet
description: A delicious Egyptian recipe with 4 cups Flour, 1 1/2 cups Water, 1/4 tsp Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 cups Flour, 1 1/2 cups Water, 1/4 tsp Salt, 1 cup Unsalted Butter, 1/4 cup Olive Oil.
Mix the flour and salt then pour one cup of water and start kneading.
If you feel the dough is still not coming together or too dry, gradually add the remaining water until you get a dough that is very elastic so that when you pull it and it won’t be torn.
Warm up the butter/ghee or oil you are using and pour into a deep bowl.
Fold the dough over itself to form a square brushing in between folds with the butter mixture.
Fold the outer one over brushing with more butter mixture as you fold.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: French Onion Soup
description: A delicious French recipe with 50g Butter, 1 tbs Olive Oil, 1 kg Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 50g Butter, 1 tbs Olive Oil, 1 kg Onion, 1 tsp Sugar, 4 sliced Garlic Clove.
Add the onions and fry with the lid on for 10 mins until soft.
Sprinkle in the sugar and cook for 20 mins more, stirring frequently, until caramelised.
Add the garlic for the final few mins of the onions’ cooking time, then sprinkle in the flour and stir well.
Increase the heat and keep stirring as you gradually add the wine, followed by the hot stock.
Cover and simmer for 15-20 mins.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fresh sardines
description: A delicious Croatian recipe with 500g Sardines, Dash Vegetable Oil, To Glaze Flour and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 500g Sardines, Dash Vegetable Oil, To Glaze Flour, Dash Salt.
Roll in the flour and deep fry in oil until crispy.
Lay on kitchen towel to get rid of the excess oil and serve hot or cold with a slice of lemon.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Griddled flatbreads
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 250g Strong Wholemeal Flour, 250g Strong white bread flour, 15g Yeast and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 250g Strong Wholemeal Flour, 250g Strong white bread flour, 15g Yeast, 1 tsp Sugar, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil.
Add the yeast, sugar and 1tsp salt, then mix well.
Pour in 350ml warm water and the oil, then process to a soft dough.
Mix for 1 min, then leave until doubled in size, about 1 hour.
Place bread directly onto the bbq racks and cook for a couple of mins until they puff up, then flip over and cook on the other side.
Tip into a basket and serve with the dips.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Hummus
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 400g Chickpeas, 1 tablespoon Tahini Paste, 1 large Garlic Clove and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 400g Chickpeas, 1 tablespoon Tahini Paste, 1 large Garlic Clove, 3  tablespoons Greek Yogurt, Juice of half Lemon.
Tip the chickpeas, tahini, garlic and yogurt into a food processor or blender and whizz to smooth.
Stir in a squeeze of lemon juice and season to taste.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Ajo blanco
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 150g White bread, 200g Almonds, 50 ml Extra Virgin Olive Oil and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 150g White bread, 200g Almonds, 50 ml Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 1 Garlic Clove, 1 ½ tbsp Red Wine Vinegar.
Tip the bread into a bowl and pour over 350ml water.
Blend the ingredients together with 350ml water and 1 tsp salt.
Let the soup cool in the fridge for 1 hr or so, then serve with a drizzle of oil and some black pepper.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Broccoli & Stilton soup
description: A delicious British recipe with 2 tblsp Rapeseed Oil, 1 finely chopped Onion, 1 Celery and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 tblsp Rapeseed Oil, 1 finely chopped Onion, 1 Celery, 1 sliced Leek, 1 medium Potatoes.
Heat the rapeseed oil in a large saucepan and then add the onions.
Cook on a medium heat until soft.
Add a splash of water if the onions start to catch.
Add the celery, leek, potato and a knob of butter.
Stir until melted, then cover with a lid.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Clam chowder
description: A delicious American recipe with 1½ kg Clams, 50g Butter, 150g Bacon and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1½ kg Clams, 50g Butter, 150g Bacon, 1 finely chopped Onion, sprigs of fresh Thyme.
Cover, bring to the boil and simmer for 2 mins until the clams have just opened.
Heat the butter in the same pan and sizzle the bacon for 3-4 mins until it starts to brown.
Stir in the onion, thyme and bay and cook everything gently for 10 mins until the onion is soft and golden.
Scatter over the flour and stir in to make a sandy paste, cook for 2 mins more, then gradually stir in the clam stock then the milk and the cream.
Throw in the potatoes, bring everything to a simmer and leave to bubble away gently for 10 mins or until the potatoes are cooked.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Quick gazpacho
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 250g Passata, 1 chopped Red Pepper, 1 chopped Red Chilli and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 250g Passata, 1 chopped Red Pepper, 1 chopped Red Chilli, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic, 1 teaspoon Sherry vinegar.
In a blender (or with a stick blender), whizz together the passata, red pepper, chilli, garlic, sherry vinegar and lime juice until smooth.
Season to taste, then serve with ice cubes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fasoliyyeh Bi Z-Zayt (Syrian Green Beans with Olive Oil)
description: A delicious Syrian recipe with 16 ounces Green Beans, 1/4 cup Olive Oil, Dash Salt and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 16 ounces Green Beans, 1/4 cup Olive Oil, Dash Salt, 1 clove Garlic, 1/4 cup Cilantro.
Season with salt to taste, and put the lid on the pot.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until beans are cooked to your desired doneness.
Syrians like it cooked until the green beans are turning brownish in color.
Add cilantro and garlic to the beans, and continue to cook just until the cilantro has started to wilt.
Eat as a main course by scooping up with warm pita bread or serve as a side dish.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Padron peppers
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 500g Padron peppers and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 500g Padron peppers.
Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan over a high heat, or if using an air-fryer, heat to 205c for 3 mins.
Fry the peppers, stirring frequently, for 5 mins until blistered and wilted.
Transfer the peppers to a serving plate and season with some sea salt.
Serve with dips or as part of a tapas spread, if you like.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Red onion pickle
description: A delicious Norwegian recipe with 3 Large Red Onions, 2 tsp Sea Salt, 200ml Cider Vinegar and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Large Red Onions, 2 tsp Sea Salt, 200ml Cider Vinegar, 50g Granulated Sugar, 1 tsp Black Pepper.
Peel the onions, cut them in half from top to bottom and finely slice into half-moon pieces.
Bring to a simmer, stirring to help the sugar dissolve, and cook for a couple of minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Roast fennel and aubergine paella
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 6 small Baby Aubergine, 4 small Fennel, 1 thinly sliced Red Pepper and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 6 small Baby Aubergine, 4 small Fennel, 1 thinly sliced Red Pepper, 1 medium Courgettes, 1 finely chopped Onion.
Add a glug of olive oil, season with salt and pepper and toss around to coat the veggies in the oil.
Roast in the oven for 20 minutes, turning a couple of times until the veg are pretty much cooked through and turning golden.
2 meanwhile, heat a paella pan or large frying pan over a low– medium heat and add a glug of olive oil.
Sauté the onion for 8–10 minutes until softened.
Increase the heat to medium and stir in the rice, paprika and saffron.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Vegan banh mi
description: A delicious Vietnamese recipe with 150g Raw Vegetables, 3  tablespoons Vegan White Wine Vinegar, 1 tsp Golden Caster Sugar and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 150g Raw Vegetables, 3  tablespoons Vegan White Wine Vinegar, 1 tsp Golden Caster Sugar, 1 large Baguette, 100g Hummus.
Put the shredded veg in a bowl and add the vinegar, sugar and 1 tsp salt.
Heat oven to 180c/160c fan/gas 4.
Cut the baguette into four, then slice each piece horizontally in half.
Spread each piece with a layer of hummus, then top four pieces with the tempeh slices and pile the pickled veg on top.
To serve, sprinkle over the herbs and squeeze over some hot sauce, then top with the other baguette pieces to make sandwiches.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Vegan Chocolate Cake
description: A delicious American recipe with 1 1/4 cup Self-raising Flour, 1/2 cup coco sugar, 1/3 cup raw cacao and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 1/4 cup Self-raising Flour, 1/2 cup coco sugar, 1/3 cup raw cacao, 1 tsp baking powder, 2 flax eggs.
Simply mix all dry ingredients with wet ingredients and blend altogether.
Bake for 45 min on 180 degrees.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Air fryer patatas bravas
description: A delicious Spanish recipe with 900g Potatoes, 3  tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 900g Potatoes, 3  tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic, 1 tblsp Paprika.
Soak the potatoes in just-boiled water for 30 mins, then drain and leave to air-dry for 5 mins.
Heat the air fryer to 200c.
Tip the potatoes into a bowl and drizzle over 1 tbsp of the oil and add 1/2 tsp each of salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Mix to coat the potatoes all over, then tip into the air fryer basket and cook for 20-30 mins until crisp and golden.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil in a small pan over a medium-low heat and fry the onion for 8-10 mins until softened but not golden.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Algerian Flafla (Bell Pepper Salad)
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 3 Green Pepper, 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 tablespoon chopped Red Onions and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Green Pepper, 1 tablespoon Olive Oil, 1 tablespoon chopped Red Onions, 1 clove peeled crushed Garlic, To taste Salt.
Preheat an oven to 450 degrees f (230 degrees c).
Bake until the skin is spotted black and the peppers are soft, 30 to 45 minutes, turning the peppers once if necessary.
Chop the roasted peppers into half-inch pieces.
Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Stir in the onion and cook, stirring frequently, until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Aubergine & hummus grills
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 2 Aubergine, 2 tablespoons Vegetable Oil, 3 sliced thinly Bread and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Aubergine, 2 tablespoons Vegetable Oil, 3 sliced thinly Bread, 300g Hummus, 100g Walnuts.
Brush sparingly with vegetable oil, then season generously.
Grill for 15 mins, turning twice and brushing with oil until the slices are softened and cooked through.
Add 2 tsp oil and whizz briefly again, to coat.
Spread a couple of tsps of hummus on top of each slice of aubergine.
Toss the walnuts, parsley and cherry tomatoes in a bowl, season, then add the lemon juice and olive oil and toss again.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Aubergine couscous salad
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 1 sliced Aubergine, 3  tablespoons Olive Oil, 140g Couscous and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 sliced Aubergine, 3  tablespoons Olive Oil, 140g Couscous, 225g Vegetable Stock, 200g Cherry Tomatoes.
Put the aubergine on a baking sheet, brush with oil and season.
Meanwhile, tip the couscous into a large bowl, pour over the stock, then cover and leave for 10 mins.
Mix the tomatoes, mint, goat’s cheese and remaining oil together.
Fluff the couscous up with a fork, then stir in the aubergines, tomato mixture and lemon juice.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Avocado dip with new potatoes
description: A delicious Australian recipe with 3 Large Avocado, 200g Natural Yoghurt, Zest and juice of 1 Lime and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Large Avocado, 200g Natural Yoghurt, Zest and juice of 1 Lime, Juice of 1/2 Lemon, 1.25kg Baby New Potatoes.
Whizz half the avocado flesh with the yogurt, lime and lemon juice and seasoning.
Dice the remaining avocado, then gently stir into the whizzed mix with most of the lime zest.
Cover, then chill until ready to serve.
Boil potatoes for 6 mins, then drain well and toss with olive oil, chilli powder and cumin seeds.
Heat oven to 200c/180c fan/gas 6, then roast potatoes for about 30 mins, shaking the tray halfway, until golden and tender.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Baingan Bharta
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 1 large Aubergine, ½ cup Onion, 1 cup Tomatoes and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 large Aubergine, ½ cup Onion, 1 cup Tomatoes, 6 cloves Garlic, 1 Green Chilli.
Roast the aubergine till its completely cooked and tender.
Heat a small piece of charcoal on flame till it becomes smoking hot and red.
Add a few drops of oil on the charcoal.
Cooked, just like the way we do for dal tadka.
Chop the cooked eggplant finely or you can even mash it.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beetroot & red cabbage sauerkraut
description: A delicious Polish recipe with 320g Beetroot, 450g Red Cabbage, 1 small Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 320g Beetroot, 450g Red Cabbage, 1 small Onion, 2 tsp Caraway Seed, 1 tsp Sea Salt.
Tip all the ingredients into a large bowl, add 1-1½ tsp freshly ground black pepper, then scrunch it all together with your hands for 5 mins.
Press down hard and add anything heavy (packs of rice or cans work well) to weigh it down so the juices rise to cover the surface.
Give it a stir, then cover and weigh it down again as before.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beetroot latkes
description: A delicious Ukrainian recipe with 1 tablespoon Rapeseed Oil, 4 tablespoons Greek Yogurt, 1/2 bag Mint and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 tablespoon Rapeseed Oil, 4 tablespoons Greek Yogurt, 1/2 bag Mint, 150g Rocket, 130g Cherry Tomatoes.
Heat the oven to 180c/160c fan/gas 4.
Heat the oil in a large non-stick pan.
Spoon in the mixture to make six round latkes.
Fry for 4-5 mins on each side, then transfer to a baking sheet and bake for 10 mins.
Combine the yogurt and mint in a small bowl.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Beetroot Soup (Borscht)
description: A delicious Ukrainian recipe with 3 Beetroot, 4 tbs Olive Oil, 1 Chicken Stock Cube and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Beetroot, 4 tbs Olive Oil, 1 Chicken Stock Cube, 6 cups Water, 3 Potatoes.
Chop the beetroot, add water and stock cube and cook for 15mins.
Add the other ingredients and boil until soft.
Finally add the beans and cook for 5mins.
Serve in the soup pot.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Braised stuffed cabbage
description: A delicious Polish recipe with 6 large Cabbage Leaves, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 6 large Cabbage Leaves, 2 tablespoons Olive Oil, 1 chopped Onion, 2 tsp Rosemary, 1 chopped Celery.
Heat oven to 180c/fan 160c/gas 4.
Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil, add the cabbage, then cook for just 1-2 mins until the leaves are starting to wilt.
Heat the oil in a pan, add the onion, then fry for 5 mins until slightly browned.
Add the rosemary and celery, then cook for 8 mins more.
Stir in the rice, then cook for a min or so until the grains are glistening.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Cabbage Soup (Shchi)
description: A delicious Russian recipe with 3 tbs Unsalted Butter, 1 large Onion, 1 medium Cabbage and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 tbs Unsalted Butter, 1 large Onion, 1 medium Cabbage, 1 Carrots, 1 Celery.
Add the butter to a large dutch oven or other heavy-duty pot over medium heat.
When the butter has melted, add the onion and sauté until translucent.
Add the cabbage, carrot, and celery.
Sauté until the vegetables begin to soften, stirring frequently, about 3 minutes.
Add the bay leaf and vegetable stock and bring to a boil over high heat.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chickpea Fajitas
description: A delicious Mexican recipe with 400g Chickpeas, 1 tblsp Olive Oil, pinch Paprika and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 400g Chickpeas, 1 tblsp Olive Oil, pinch Paprika, 2 small cut chunks Tomatoes, 1 finely sliced Red Onions.
Heat oven to 200c/180c fan/gas 6 and line a baking tray with foil.
Add the oil and paprika, toss to coat, then roast for 20-25 mins until browned and crisp, shaking halfway through cooking.
Stir in the lime juice and season well.
Mix the soured cream with the harissa and set aside until ready to serve.
Heat a griddle pan until nearly smoking.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chinese Tomato Egg Stir Fry
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 1 lb Plum Tomatoes, 1 tablespoon Vegetable Oil, 5 Large Eggs and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Plum Tomatoes, 1 tablespoon Vegetable Oil, 5 Large Eggs, 1 tsp Sesame Seed Oil, 2 tsp Chicken Bouillon Powder.
Add 1/4 cup of broth followed by 2 teaspoons of cornstarch dissolved in 1 tablespoprepare the tomatoes:.
Slice the tomatoes in half.
Cut each half into equal thirds (you’ll get 6 slices from each tomato).
In a cold, 8 to 10-inch nonstick skillet, add the vegetable oil and beaten eggs.
Turn the heat to medium.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Chtitha Batata (Algerian Potato Stew)
description: A delicious Algerian recipe with 4 cloves Garlic, 1 small Red Chilli, 1 tsp Ground Cumin and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 cloves Garlic, 1 small Red Chilli, 1 tsp Ground Cumin, 1 teaspoon Paprika, 1/2 teaspoon Black Pepper.
Combine garlic, chile pepper, cumin, paprika, black pepper, cayenne, and salt in a mortar; grind with a pestle until it forms a paste.
Add olive oil and mix dersa well.
Heat a large saucepan over medium heat and stir-fry dersa until fragrant, 2 to 4 minutes.
Add potato halves and stir to combine with the dersa.
Pour in enough water to just cover the potatoes and bring to a boil.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Crispy Eggplant
description: A delicious Filipino recipe with 1 large Egg Plants, 1 cup Breadcrumbs, 50g Sesame Seed and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 large Egg Plants, 1 cup Breadcrumbs, 50g Sesame Seed, 2 Eggs, To taste Salt.
Slice eggplant into 1 cm (0.
After 30 minutes wash eggplant slices from salt and pat dry with a kitchen towel.
Heal oil in a large skillet over high heat.
Dip eggplant slices in egg, then in crumbs, and place in hot oil.
Fry 2 to 3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Cucumber & fennel salad
description: A delicious Polish recipe with 1 large Cucumber, 1 tsp Sugar, 1 sliced Fennel Bulb and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 large Cucumber, 1 tsp Sugar, 1 sliced Fennel Bulb, 150ml Sour Cream, Juice of 1 Lemon.
Mix soured cream, lemon juice, vinegar and dill, then season with black pepper and add to fennel mix.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Dal fry
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 1 cup Toor dal, 2-1/2 cups Water, 1 tsp Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 cup Toor dal, 2-1/2 cups Water, 1 tsp Salt, 1/4 tsp Turmeric, 3 tbs Ghee.
Cook dal with 2-1/2 cups water and add salt, turmeric, on medium high heat, until soft in texture (approximately 30 mins) it should be like thick soup.
In a frying pan, heat the ghee.
Add cumin seeds, and mustard seeds.
After the seeds crack, add bay leaves, green chili, ginger and chili powder.
Stir for a few seconds.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Egg Drop Soup
description: A delicious Chinese recipe with 3 cups Chicken Stock, 1/4 tsp Salt, 1/4 tsp Sugar and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 cups Chicken Stock, 1/4 tsp Salt, 1/4 tsp Sugar, pinch Pepper, 1 tsp Sesame Seed Oil.
In a wok add chicken broth and wait for it to boil.
Next add salt, sugar, white pepper, sesame seed oil.
When the chicken broth is boiling add the vegetables to the wok.
To thicken the sauce, whisk together 1 tablespoon of cornstarch and 2 tablespoon of water in a bowl and slowly add to your soup until it's the right thickness.
Next add 1 egg slightly beaten with a knife or fork and add it to the soup slowly and stir for 8 seconds.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Eggplant Adobo
description: A delicious Filipino recipe with 1 lb Egg Plants, 2 tbs Sugar, 1 tsp Salt and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 lb Egg Plants, 2 tbs Sugar, 1 tsp Salt, 1 tsp Pepper, 1 whole Garlic.
Peel and thinly slice 8 garlic cloves.
Cook over medium-high heat, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, until light golden and crisp, about 5 minutes.
Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic chips to a plate; season lightly with salt.
Diamond crystal or morton kosher salt and cook, undisturbed, until deeply browned underneath, about 5 minutes.
Working in batches and adding more oil if needed, cook eggplant in the same pot until lightly browned, about 3 minutes per side.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Ezme
description: A delicious Turkish recipe with 3 Large Tomato, 1 medium Romano Pepper, 1 medium Green Chilli and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Large Tomato, 1 medium Romano Pepper, 1 medium Green Chilli, 1 small Onion, 2 cloves minced Garlic.
Put the tomatoes and all of the peppers in a food processor and blitz until finely chopped.
Add the onions, garlic and parsley to the food processor and blitz until finely chopped, then set aside.
Add red pepper paste, tomato purée, pomegranate molasses, pul biber, sumac, dried mint and most of the extra virgin olive oil to a serving bowl and whisk well so everything comes together as a sauce.
Tip in the blitzed onion mixture and the strained pepper mixture along with 1 tsp flaky sea salt.
Stir well, then drizzle with the remaining extra virgin olive oil to serve.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Bread omelette
description: A delicious Indian recipe with 2 Bread, 2 Egg, 0.5 Salt and more. Ready in 20 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Bread, 2 Egg, 0.5 Salt.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Breakfast Potatoes
description: A delicious Canadian recipe with 3 Medium Potatoes, 1 tbs Olive Oil, 2 strips Bacon and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 3 Medium Potatoes, 1 tbs Olive Oil, 2 strips Bacon, Minced Garlic Clove, 1 tbs Maple Syrup.
Before you do anything, freeze your bacon slices that way when you're ready to prep, it'll be so much easier to chop!.
Wash the potatoes and cut medium dice into square pieces.
In the meantime, heat 1-2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Once the oil is hot, drain the potatoes and add to the skillet.
Season with salt, pepper, and old bay as needed.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Dutch poffertjes (mini pancakes)
description: A delicious Dutch recipe with 125g Flour, 125g Buckwheat Flour, 2 Eggs and more. Ready in 30 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 125g Flour, 125g Buckwheat Flour, 2 Eggs, 1 knob Butter, 300ml Milk.
Mix the dry yeast with some of the luke warm milk en stir until dissolved.
Place buckwheat and the flour together in a bowl and make a small circle in the middle.
Add the yeast mixture into it.
Add the milk and stir until you have a smooth batter.
Add the eggs, salt and vanille sugar and stir through.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: English Breakfast
description: A delicious British recipe with 2 Sausages, 3 Bacon, 2 Mushrooms and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 2 Sausages, 3 Bacon, 2 Mushrooms, 2 Tomatoes, 1 Slice Black Pudding.
Heat the flat grill plate over a low heat, on top of 2 rings/flames if it fits, and brush sparingly with light olive oil.
Cook the sausages first.
Add the sausages to the hot grill plate/the coolest part if there is one and allow to cook slowly for about 15-20 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden.
After the first 10 minutes, increase the heat to medium before beginning to cook the other ingredients.
If you are struggling for space, completely cook the sausages and keep hot on a plate in the oven.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Fruit and Cream Cheese Breakfast Pastries
description: A delicious American recipe with 1 1/4 oz Cream Cheese, 1 1/4 cup Sugar, 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 1 1/4 oz Cream Cheese, 1 1/4 cup Sugar, 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract, Flour, 2 Puff Pastry.
Preheat oven to 400ºf (200ºc), and prepare two cookie sheets with parchment paper.
In a bowl, mix cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until fully combined.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until pastry is golden brown and puffed.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Full English Breakfast
description: A delicious British recipe with 4 Sausages, 4 Bacon, 4 Mushrooms and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 4 Sausages, 4 Bacon, 4 Mushrooms, 3 Tomatoes, 2 sliced Black Pudding.
Heat the flat grill plate over a low heat, on top of 2 rings/flames if it fits, and brush sparingly with light olive oil.
Cook the sausages first.
Add the sausages to the hot grill plate/the coolest part if there is one and allow to cook slowly for about 15-20 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden.
After the first 10 minutes, increase the heat to medium before beginning to cook the other ingredients.
If you are struggling for space, completely cook the sausages and keep hot on a plate in the oven.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.

name: Home-made Mandazi
description: A delicious Kenyan recipe with 750g Self-raising Flour, 6 tablespoons Sugar, 2 Eggs and more. Ready in 40 minutes!
instructions: Gather all ingredients: 750g Self-raising Flour, 6 tablespoons Sugar, 2 Eggs, 1 cup Milk.
You can use coconut milk instead of regular milk, you can also add desiccated coconut to the dry flour or other spices like powdered cloves or cinnamon.
For “healthy looking” mandazis do not roll the dough too thin before frying and use the procedure i have indicated above.
Mix the flour,cinnamon and sugar in a suitable bowl.
In a separate bowl whisk the egg into the milk.
Make a well at the centre of the flour and add the milk and egg mixture and slowly mix to form a dough.
Serve immediately. Serves 4.
